612545.AbridgedEffect: When a character is hit or have their HP lowered, their HP is restored if their current HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color>.
612545.EnhancedEffect: If an ally target's current HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> after being attacked or consuming HP, restores their HP by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of their Max HP. This can restore HP equal to a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> Max HP during a single action.
612545.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character is hit or consume their HP, they will restore HP if their current HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color>.

612546.Name: Hazardous Lucent Residue
612546.Effect: After a character uses their Ultimate, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> of the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
612546.AbridgedEffect: After using their Ultimate, characters gain a Shield based on the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP.
612546.EnhancedEffect: After a character uses their Ultimate, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> of the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP, plus <color=#f29e38ff>7%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
612546.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character uses their Ultimate, they gain a Shield based on the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP.

612550.Name: Primordial Black Hole
612550.Effect: Characters gain a <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> ATK increase for each Destruction Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> time(s).
612550.AbridgedEffect: The more Blessings of Destruction the team has, the higher the characters' ATK becomes.
612550.EnhancedEffect: Characters gain a <color=#f29e38ff>7%</color> ATK increase for each Destruction Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of <color=#f29e38ff>9</color> time(s).
612550.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The more Blessings of Destruction the team has, the higher the characters' ATK becomes.

612551.Name: Reflection
612551.Effect: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color> of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) per battle.
612551.AbridgedEffect: Characters can resist fatal attacks and restore their own HP. This can take effect a limited number of times among all allies.
612551.EnhancedEffect: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) per battle.
612551.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters can resist fatal attacks and restore their own HP. This can take effect a limited number of times among all allies.

612553.Name: Instability Strip
612553.Effect: When characters are hit or have lost HP, <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> Energy is regenerated.
612553.AbridgedEffect: When characters are hit or are losing HP, their Energy is regenerated.
612553.EnhancedEffect: When characters are hit or have lost HP, <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> Energy is regenerated.
612553.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When characters are hit or are losing HP, their Energy is regenerated.

612554.Name: Metric Reservation
612554.Effect: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color> the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
612554.AbridgedEffect: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield based on the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP.
612554.EnhancedEffect: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>54%</color> the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
612554.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield based on the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP.

612555.Name: Sentinel Satellite
612555.Effect: When a character's HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of their Max HP for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s). This effect can only be triggered <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) by each character per battle.
612555.AbridgedEffect: When a character's current HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, they receive a Shield. This buff can only be triggered a limited number of times.
612555.EnhancedEffect: When a character's HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of their Max HP for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s). This effect can only be triggered <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) by each character per battle.
612555.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's current HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, they receive a Shield. This buff can only be triggered a limited number of times.

612556.Name: Polarization Receptor
612556.Effect: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their DEF increases by <color=#f29e38ff>0.40%</color>.
612556.AbridgedEffect: The lower a character's current HP is, the higher their DEF becomes.
612556.EnhancedEffect: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their DEF increases by <color=#f29e38ff>0.60%</color>.
612556.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The lower a character's current HP is, the higher their DEF becomes.

612557.Name: Eternally Collapsing Object
612557.Effect: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their Effect RES increases by <color=#f29e38ff>0.30%</color>.
612557.AbridgedEffect: The lower a character's current HP is, the higher their Effect RES becomes.
612557.EnhancedEffect: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their Effect RES increases by <color=#f29e38ff>0.45%</color>.
612557.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The lower a character's current HP is, the higher their Effect RES becomes.

612620.Name: Path Resonance: Elation
612620.Effect: Can consume 100 points of Energy to use the ability and resonate with the Path of Elation, dealing Follow-up ATK DMG of a random Type to all enemies for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> ‚Äì <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s).
612620.AbridgedEffect: After using Path Resonance, deals Follow-up ATK DMG of a random Type to all enemies for a random number of times.

612621.Name: Resonance Formation: Doomsday Carnival
612621.Effect: When Path Resonance: Elation deals DMG, there is a 150% base chance to apply <u>Sensory Pursuit</u> to enemies for 1 turn.
612621.AbridgedEffect: Every time Path Resonance deals DMG, there is a high chance to apply <u>Sensory Pursuit</u> to the target enemy.

612622.Name: Resonance Formation: Dance of Growth
612622.Effect: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from 100 to 200 points. Using abilities to resonate with a Path will consume all Energy. For every <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> Energy consumed that exceeds the original limit, attacks will deal DMG for 1 extra time.
612622.AbridgedEffect: Doubles the Energy limit of Path Resonance. When using Path Resonance, consume all Energy to increase the number of damaging hits from the Resonance.

612623.Name: Resonance Formation: Instant Win
612623.Effect: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> Energy. When a character launches a Follow-up ATK, Path Resonance additionally regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> Energy.
612623.AbridgedEffect: When entering battle, Path Resonances regenerates energy. When characters launch Follow-up ATKs, Path Resonances regenerates energy.

612624.Name: Resonance Interplay: The Taste of Anglerfish
612624.Effect: When Path Resonance: Elation deals DMG, randomly dispels 1 debuff on 1 ally.
612624.AbridgedEffect: When Path Resonance: Elation deals DMG, randomly dispels the debuffs on a character.

612625.Name: Resonance Interplay: Guinea Pig in Ice Coffin
612625.Effect: When Path Resonance: Elation deals Ice DMG, there is a 150% base chance to Freeze the enemy target for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
612625.AbridgedEffect: When Path Resonance: Elation deals Ice DMG, there is a high chance to Freeze the enemy.

612626.Name: Resonance Interplay: Unending Night
612626.Effect: When Path Resonance deals Fire/Wind/Physical/Lightning DMG, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> base chance to apply a DoT of the same Type, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turns.
612626.AbridgedEffect: When the Path Resonance deals Fire, Wind, Physical or Lightning DMG, there is a chance inflict the DoT effect of the same type.

612627.Name: Resonance Interplay: Pit and Pendulum
612627.Effect: When using the Path Resonance, for every <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> Energy consumed, the ally with the highest ATK and all units summoned by allies will have their action Advanced Forward by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color>.
612627.AbridgedEffect: Based on the amount of Energy used, Path Resonance advances the actions of the ally with the highest ATK and all units summoned by allies.

612630.Name: Auto-Harmonica: Whitest Night
612630.Effect: After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, they deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>55%</color> of their ATK for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s).
612630.AbridgedEffect: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> ‚Äî <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s).
612630.EnhancedEffect: After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, they deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of their ATK for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> ‚Äì <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s). Moreover, increases <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color>.
612630.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After characters launch Follow-up ATK, deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> ‚Äî <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s) and increase <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG.

612631.Name: Slaughterhouse No. 4: Rest in Peace
612631.Effect: When characters launch Follow-up ATKs to an enemy, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> extra time(s).
612631.AbridgedEffect: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG 1 time. If the enemy currently has their Weakness Broken, then deal this DMG <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> extra time(s).
612631.EnhancedEffect: When characters launch Follow-up ATKs to an enemy, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> extra time(s).
612631.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG 1 time. If the enemy currently has their Weakness Broken, then deal this DMG <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> extra time(s).

612632.Name: Champion's Dinner: Cat's Cradle
612632.Effect: When a character uses Ultimate to deal DMG to an enemy target, it is considered as Follow-up ATK. Increases DMG dealt by Follow-up ATKs by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color>.
612632.AbridgedEffect: Characters' Ultimates are considered as Follow-up ATK. The DMG dealt by Follow-up ATK increases.
612632.EnhancedEffect: When a character uses Ultimate to deal DMG to an enemy target, it is considered as Follow-up ATK. Increases DMG dealt by Follow-up ATKs by <color=#f29e38ff>55%</color>.
612632.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters' Ultimates are considered as Follow-up ATK. The DMG dealt by Follow-up ATK increases.

612640.Name: Portrait of A Man On Fire
612640.Effect: When causing <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG to an enemy, characters deal additional <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG of different Types for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s), at DMG values equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of the original DMG.
612640.AbridgedEffect: Every time enemies receive <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG, they also receive extra <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s).
612640.EnhancedEffect: When causing <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG to an enemy, characters deal extra <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG of different Types for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s), at DMG values equal to <color=#f29e38ff>90%</color> of the original DMG.
612640.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Every time enemies receive <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG, they also receive extra <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s).

612641.Name: Just Keep on Crying!
612641.Effect: For every 1 Type of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG the enemy received, increases the DMG taken by them by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color> until the end of their next action.
612641.AbridgedEffect: The more DMG Types an enemy receives from <u>Aftertaste</u>, the more DMG they receive.
612641.EnhancedEffect: For every 1 Type of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG the enemy received, increases the DMG taken by them by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color> until the end of their next action.
612641.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The more DMG Types an enemy receives from <u>Aftertaste</u>, the more DMG they receive.

612642.Name: The Hourglass Kindergarten
612642.Effect: For every 1 Type of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>4%</color> until the end of their next action.
612642.AbridgedEffect: The more DMG Types an enemy receives from <u>Aftertaste</u>, the more their ATK is reduced.
612642.EnhancedEffect: For every 1 Type of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>6%</color> until the end of their next action.
612642.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The more DMG Types an enemy receives from <u>Aftertaste</u>, the more their ATK is reduced.

612643.Name: The Painted Albatross
612643.Effect: For each enemy hit by a character's Follow-up ATK, the character deals Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> of their ATK to all enemies hit.
612643.AbridgedEffect: Deals Additional DMG based on the number of enemies hit by Follow-up ATK.
612643.EnhancedEffect: For each enemy hit by a character's Follow-up ATK, the character deals Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color> of their ATK to all enemies hit.
612643.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Deals Additional DMG based on the number of enemies hit by Follow-up ATK.

612644.Name: 12 Monkeys and Angry Men
612644.Effect: When a character deals Follow-up ATK DMG to an enemy target, the Follow-up ATK DMG within this attack increases by <color=#f29e38ff>4%</color>.
612644.AbridgedEffect: The DMG dealt by characters within a single Follow-up ATK increases gradually.
612644.EnhancedEffect: When a character deals Follow-up ATK DMG to an enemy target, the Follow-up ATK DMG within this attack increases by <color=#f29e38ff>6%</color>.
612644.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The DMG dealt by characters within a single Follow-up ATK increases gradually.

612645.Name: Aiden Gravitational Rainbow
612645.Effect: When a character launches Follow-up ATKs on enemies, the enemies' action is delayed by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>.
612645.AbridgedEffect: After a character launches Follow-up ATKs, the enemy's action is delayed.
612645.EnhancedEffect: When characters launch Follow-up ATKs on enemies, the attacked enemies' actions are delayed by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>, and there is a <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> base chance to cause Imprisonment on the enemies, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
612645.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, the target enemy's action is delayed, and there is a low chance of applying Imprisonment on them.

612646.Name: Twenty-First Military Rule
612646.Effect: After a character launches Follow-up ATKs, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>65%</color> fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
612646.AbridgedEffect: After a character launches Follow-up ATKs, there is a chance of recovering a Skill Point.
612646.EnhancedEffect: After a character launches Follow-up ATKs, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
612646.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character launches a Follow-up ATK, Skill Point recovery is guaranteed.

612650.Name: Exemplary Conduct
612650.Effect: For each Elation Blessing in possession, increases characters' Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>9%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> time(s).
612650.AbridgedEffect: The more Blessings of Elation the team has, the higher the Follow-up ATK DMG becomes.
612650.EnhancedEffect: For each Elation Blessing in possession, increases characters' Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>9</color> time(s).
612650.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The more Blessings of Elation the team has, the higher the Follow-up ATK DMG becomes.

612651.Name: Mostly Harmful
612651.Effect: The Weakness Break Efficiency increases by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> when characters deal Follow-up ATK DMG.
612651.AbridgedEffect: Follow-up ATKs' Weakness Break Efficiency increases.
612651.EnhancedEffect: The Weakness Break Efficiency increases by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> when characters deal Follow-up ATK DMG.
612651.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Follow-up ATKs' Weakness Break Efficiency increases.

612652.Name: Suspiria
612652.Effect: Increases characters' Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>26%</color>.
612652.EnhancedEffect: Increases characters' Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>39%</color>.

612653.Name: Pale Fire
612653.Effect: Increases the CRIT Rate for Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>26%</color>.
612653.EnhancedEffect: Increases the CRIT Rate for Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>39%</color>.

612654.Name: Back to the Lighthouse
612654.Effect: When a character deals DMG to an enemy with a Follow-up ATK, increases their Energy Regeneration Rate by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color>.
612654.AbridgedEffect: When a character launches a Follow-up ATK, their Energy Regeneration Rate increases.
612654.EnhancedEffect: When a character deals DMG to an enemy with a Follow-up ATK, increases their Energy Regeneration Rate by <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color>.
612654.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character launches a Follow-up ATK, their Energy Regeneration Rate increases.

612655.Name: Doctor of Love
612655.Effect: After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, restores their HP by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of their Max HP.
612655.AbridgedEffect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, they restore HP.
612655.EnhancedEffect: After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, restores their HP by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> of their Max HP.
612655.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, they restore HP.

612656.Name: Platinum Age
612656.Effect: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increase their DEF by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
612656.AbridgedEffect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, their DEF increases.
612656.EnhancedEffect: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increase their DEF by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
612656.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, their DEF increases.

612657.Name: Clockwork Apple
612657.Effect: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increases SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
612657.AbridgedEffect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, their SPD increases.
612657.EnhancedEffect: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increases SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
612657.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, their SPD increases.

612720.Name: Path Resonance: Propagation
612720.Effect: Consumes 100 Energy to resonate with the Path of Propagation and allows a target ally to immediately take action, recover <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> Skill Point(s) and become affected by <u>Metamorphosis</u>. <u>Metamorphosis</u> lasts for 1 turn and only takes effect on the latest target.
612720.AbridgedEffect: After using a Path Resonance, a target ally immediately takes action, recovering <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> Skill Point(s) and activating <u>Metamorphosis</u>.

612721.Name: Resonance Formation: Proboscis
612721.Effect: Extends the duration of <u>Metamorphosis</u> for 1 turn. After a character with <u>Metamorphosis</u> defeats an enemy, Path Resonance regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> Energy.
612721.AbridgedEffect: The duration of <u>Metamorphosis</u> is extended for 1 turn. After a character with <u>Metamorphosis</u> defeats an enemy, Path Resonance regenerates Energy.

612722.Name: Resonance Formation: Phenol Compounds
612722.Effect: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from 100 to 200 points. After a character consumes or recovers Skill Points, additionally regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>1.0%</color> Energy for Path Resonance.
612722.AbridgedEffect: Path Resonance's Energy limit is doubled. After a character consumes or recovers Skill Points, Path Resonance regenerates energy.

612723.Name: Resonance Formation: Crystal Pincers
612723.Effect: <u>Metamorphosis</u> additionally increases DMG dealt by a character by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>. Only when a character is under the <u>Metamorphosis</u> effect can they cause <u>Spores</u> to burst. Every time a character causes 1 <u>Spore</u> to burst, additionally deals Basic ATK DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of the character's ATK. This effect can trigger up to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s) on the same target.
612723.AbridgedEffect: Increases DMG dealt by characters with <u>Metamorphosis</u>. Only this type of character can cause <u>Spores</u> to burst, dealing additional DMG after bursting.

612724.Name: Resonance Interplay: Superposition Eye
612724.Effect: After using Path Resonance, nullifies all DMG received by a single target ally except DoT. This status is dispelled after being attacked. If the target ally's current HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> when Path Resonance is used, it will additionally recover <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> Skill Point(s).
612724.AbridgedEffect: After using a Path Resonance, make a target ally able to Block 1 attack. If that ally's HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, recover <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> Skill Point(s).

612725.Name: Resonance Interplay: Adherent Microbial Mat
612725.Effect: When using Path Resonance, a single target ally gains a Shield equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s).
612725.AbridgedEffect: When using a Path Resonance, grants Shield to a target ally.

612726.Name: Resonance Interplay: Compounded Macrospore
612726.Effect: When using Path Resonance, heals the target ally for <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of their Max HP. <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color> of the healing that exceeds Max HP will be evenly distributed among other characters.
612726.AbridgedEffect: When using Path Resonance, heals a target ally. Any exceeded Healing will be distributed to heal other allies.

612727.Name: Resonance Interplay: Condensation Cavity
612727.Effect: Characters in the <u>Metamorphosis</u> status deal <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> more DMG to Frozen enemies. In addition, their attacks have a <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> base chance to Freeze hit targets for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turns.
612727.AbridgedEffect: Characters in the <u>Metamorphosis</u> state deal more DMG to Frozen enemies. In addition, their attacks have a low chance of Freezing the target.

612730.Name: Spore Discharge
612730.Effect: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> <u>Spore(s)</u>.
612730.AbridgedEffect: When a character consumes Skill Points, causes all enemies to receive <u>Spores</u>.
612730.EnhancedEffect: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> <u>Spores</u>. When all Skill Points are consumed, the SPD of the character who consumed the last Skill Point increases by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
612730.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character consumes Skill Points, causes all enemies to receive <u>Spores</u>. If Skill Points are consumed to 0, increases the character's SPD.

612731.Name: Fungal Pustule
612731.Effect: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 <u>Spore</u> to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> random enemy target(s).
612731.AbridgedEffect: When a character recovers Skill Points, causes a random enemy to receive <u>Spores</u>.
612731.EnhancedEffect: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 <u>Spore</u> to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> random enemy target(s). The max number of <u>Spores</u> that can be possessed increases to <color=#f29e38ff>9</color>.
612731.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character recovers Skill Points, causes a random enemy to receive <u>Spores</u>. Increases the number of <u>Spores</u> they can bear.

612732.Name: Scythe Limbs
612732.Effect: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed. For each Skill Point consumed, the character's CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s), lasting until the character uses an attack.
612732.AbridgedEffect: After a character uses an Ultimate, when a Skill Point is consumed, it is considered as additionally consuming 1 Skill Point. The more Skill Points a character consumes, the higher their CRIT DMG.
612732.EnhancedEffect: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume or recover Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed or recovered. For each Skill Point consumed or recovered, the character's CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s), lasting until after the character uses an attack.
612732.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character uses the Ultimate, consuming or recovering Skill Points will be considered as additionally consuming or recovering 1 Skill Point. The more Skill Points a character consumes or recovers, the higher their CRIT DMG.

612740.Name: Putrefaction Ulcer
612740.Effect: Changes the number of times <u>Spores</u> can spread after bursting to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> times. Can also spread to the original bearer of <u>Spores</u>.
612740.AbridgedEffect: The number of times <u>Spores</u> can spread after bursting increases. Can also spread to the original bearer.
612740.EnhancedEffect: Changes the number of times <u>Spores</u> can spread after bursting to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> times. Can also spread to the original bearer of <u>Spores</u>.
612740.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The number of times <u>Spores</u> can spread after bursting increases. Can also spread to the original bearer.

612741.Name: Lytic Enzyme
612741.Effect: Increases the DMG caused by <u>Spores</u> bursting. The DMG increased is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the <u>Spores</u> they were carrying will spread to targets adjacent to them.
612741.AbridgedEffect: Increases DMG dealt by <u>Spores</u>. After an enemy is defeated, enemies adjacent to it will receive its <u>Spores</u>.
612741.EnhancedEffect: Increases the DMG caused by <u>Spores</u> bursting. The DMG increased is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the <u>Spores</u> they were carrying will spread to other enemy targets.
612741.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases DMG dealt by <u>Spores</u>. After an enemy is defeated, other enemies will receive its <u>Spores</u>.

612742.Name: Metabolic Cavity
612742.Effect: For each <u>Spore</u> that bursts, heals the character with the lowest HP percentage by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of their Max HP.
612742.AbridgedEffect: After <u>Spores</u> burst, restores the HP of the character with the lowest HP percentage.
612742.EnhancedEffect: For each <u>Spore</u> possessed by all enemies, reduces the DMG received by all allies by <color=#f29e38ff>0.8%</color>, After the <u>Spores</u> burst, heals the ally with the lowest HP percentage by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color> of their Max HP.
612742.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Based on the total number of <u>Spores</u> on enemies, lowers DMG received by a character. After <u>Spores</u> burst, restores the HP of the character with the lowest HP percentage.

612743.Name: Excitatory Gland
612743.Effect: If the team has 0 Skill Points when an ally uses their Basic ATK, additionally recovers 1 Skill Point.
612743.AbridgedEffect: If the team has 0 Skill Points when an ally uses their Basic ATK, additionally recovers 1 Skill Point.
612743.EnhancedEffect: If the Skill Point is 0 when using Basic ATK, additionally recovers 1 Skill Point and has a <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> fixed chance of further recovering 1 Skill Point.
612743.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Upon using a Basic ATK, should your Skill Points be 0, you will additionally recover 1 Skill Point and have a random chance to recover another 1 thereafter.

612744.Name: Exposed Brain Matter
612744.Effect: DMG dealt by characters' Basic ATK also deals DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of the original DMG to a random adjacent target.
612744.AbridgedEffect: Basic ATK DMG will Blast a random adjacent target.
612744.EnhancedEffect: DMG dealt by characters' Basic ATK also deals DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> of the original DMG to adjacent targets.
612744.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Basic ATK DMG will Blast adjacent targets.

612745.Name: Intersegmental Membrane
612745.Effect: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them decreases by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s).
612745.AbridgedEffect: The more Skill Points a character consumes, the lower the DMG they receive.
612745.EnhancedEffect: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them decreases by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s).
612745.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The more Skill Points a character consumes, the lower the DMG they receive.

612746.Name: Catalyst
612746.Effect: After a character uses their Skill and if the Skill did not unleash an attack, all allies' DMG dealt increases by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s).
612746.AbridgedEffect: If, after a character uses their Skill, the Skill does not initiate an attack, increases the DMG of all allies.
612746.EnhancedEffect: After a character uses their Skill and if the Skill did not unleash an attack, all allies' DMG dealt increases by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s).
612746.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: If, after a character uses their Skill, the Skill does not initiate an attack, increases the DMG of all allies.

612750.Name: Osseus Blade
612750.Effect: For each Blessing of Propagation in possession, increases all characters' Basic ATK DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>9%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> time(s).

612750.EnhancedEffect: For each Blessing of Propagation in possession, increases all characters' Basic ATK DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>9</color> time(s).
612750.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The more Blessings of Propagation the team has, the higher Basic ATK DMG becomes.

612820.Name: Path Resonance: "Erudition"

612821.Name: Resonance Formation: Melt Core

612821.AbridgedEffect: When <u>Synapse Resonance</u> is triggered by an Ultimate, it will deal more DMG to the enemy with the highest Max HP.

612830.Name: BCI<unbreak>-34</unbreak> Gray Matter
612830.Effect: When entering battle, charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>65%</color>. Breaking an enemy's Weakness charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color>.

612830.EnhancedEffect: When entering battle, charges <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. Breaking an enemy's Weakness or attacking Weakness Broken enemies will charge <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> or <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> respectively. This effect can only be triggered once by each enemy during each attack.
612830.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When entering battle, charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>. Breaking an enemy's Weakness or attacking Weakness Broken enemies charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>.

612831.Name: SMR-2 Amygdala

612831.EnhancedEffect: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> is fully charged, characters' SPD increases by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
612831.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>. Every time the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> is fully charged, gains a SPD bonus.

612832.Name: VEP<unbreak>-18</unbreak> Occipital Lobe
612832.Effect: The All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>. When an Ultimate is used, for every enemy target that is hit by this Ultimate, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt will additionally increase by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>. This effect lasts until the next time an Ultimate is used.
612832.AbridgedEffect: Increases the All-Type RES PEN for characters' Ultimate DMG. The more enemy targets the Ultimate attacks, the greater the increase in the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG, lasting until the next time the Ultimate is used.

For each enemy target hit by the Ultimate that achieves the highest number of enemy hits in a single attack in this battle, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt additionally increases by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>.

612840.Name: Attachment: Vestibular System

612841.Name: Imitation: Transmitter Synthesis

612842.EnhancedEffect: After characters use their Ultimate via <u>Brain in a Vat</u>, they gain a Shield equal in strength to <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turns.

612843.Name: Mimesis: Tactile Pathway

612843.EnhancedEffect: After characters use an attack, they deal Additional DMG to the attacked enemy target(s). Up to 5 enemies that have been defeated in the current battle will also be regarded as having been attacked.

612845.Name: Load: Striated Cortex

612855.Name: Canopy of Mottled Metal

615020.Name: The Architects

Based on the total Shield Effect of all allies, deals Physical DMG to all enemies.

615030.Effect: After a character launches an attack, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the character's current Shield to the hit enemies.
615030.AbridgedEffect: After attacking enemies, the attacking character deals <u>Quake</u> DMG based on the current Shield Effect on the character.
615030.EnhancedEffect: After a character launches an attack, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the character's current Shield Effect plus <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of the total Shield Effect of the character's teammates to the hit enemies.
615030.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After attacking enemies, the attacking character deals <u>Quake</u> DMG based on the current total Shield Effect on the ally team.

615031.Name: Divine Construct: Metastatic Field
615031.Effect: After a character is attacked, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG to the attacker, equal to <color=#f29e38ff>280%</color> of the character's Shield Effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.
615031.AbridgedEffect: After a character is hit by an attack, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG to the enemy target based on the total Shield Effect on the character before they were hit.
615031.EnhancedEffect: After a character is attacked, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG to the attacker, equal to <color=#f29e38ff>420%</color> of the character's Shield Effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.
615031.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character is hit by an attack, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG to the enemy target based on the total Shield Effect on the character before they were hit.

615032.Name: Divine Construct: Macrosegregation
615032.Effect: Characters gain a special Shield. When characters obtain other Shields, this special Shield will increase by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the new Shield Effect. At the start of the character's turn, lose <color=#f29e38ff>90%</color> of the Shield Effect that exceeds <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of the character's Max HP.
615032.AbridgedEffect: Characters gains a special stackable Shield. When a turn begins, the Shield loses a certain amount of Shield Effect.
615032.EnhancedEffect: Characters gain a special Shield. When characters obtain other Shields, this special Shield will increase by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the new Shield Effect. At the start of the character's turn, lose <color=#f29e38ff>85%</color> of the Shield Effect that exceeds <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color> of the character's Max HP.
615032.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters gains a special stackable Shield. When a turn begins, the Shield loses a certain amount of Shield Effect.

615040.Name: Interstellar Construct: Shear Structure
615040.Effect: Characters deal <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> increased <u>Quake</u> DMG to their target enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also take <u>Quake</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> of DMG dealt to the primary target enemy.
615040.AbridgedEffect: <u>Quake</u> DMG increases and affects enemies adjacent to the target enemy.
615040.EnhancedEffect: Characters deal <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> increased <u>Quake</u> DMG to their target, and other targets also take <u>Quake</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of DMG dealt to the primary target enemy.
615040.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: <u>Quake</u> DMG increases and is Blasted to all enemies.

615041.Name: Interstellar Construct: Solid Solution
615041.Effect: Deals increased <u>Quake</u> DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of the character's current DEF.
615041.AbridgedEffect: The DMG <u>Quake</u> deals increases with the character's DEF.
615041.EnhancedEffect: Deals increased <u>Quake</u> DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>120%</color> of the character's current DEF.
615041.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The DMG <u>Quake</u> deals increases with the character's DEF.

615042.Name: Interstellar Construct: Safe Load
615042.Effect: Shielded characters increase their ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> of the Shield Effect on them, up to a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff>120%</color> of their Base ATK.
615042.AbridgedEffect: Shielded characters increase their ATK based on the max DMG that can be absorbed by their current Shields.
615042.EnhancedEffect: Shielded characters increase their ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of the Shield Effect on them, up to a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff>160%</color> of their Base ATK.
615042.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Shielded characters increase their ATK based on the max DMG that can be absorbed by their current Shields.

615043.Name: Interstellar Construct: Sanctuary
615043.Effect: At the end of the turn, characters gain a Shield that can block DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615043.AbridgedEffect: Characters receive a Shield at the end of the turn.
615043.EnhancedEffect: At the end of the turn, characters gain a Shield that can block DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615043.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters receive a Shield at the end of the turn.

615044.Name: Interstellar Construct: Quadrangular Pyramid
615044.Effect: Increase the max DMG that can be absorbed by Shields created by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
615044.AbridgedEffect: Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by Shields created by characters.
615044.EnhancedEffect: When characters' gain a Shield, increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color>.
615044.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character receives a Shield, increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield.

615045.Name: Interstellar Construct: Hypereutectoid
615045.Effect: When a character provides Shields to an ally, both units will increase their DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>, stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s), lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615045.AbridgedEffect: When a character provides Shield to an ally, the DMG dealt by both characters increases. This effect is stackable.
615045.EnhancedEffect: When a character provides Shields to an ally, both units will increase their DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>, stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s), lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615045.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character provides Shield to an ally, the DMG dealt by both characters increases. This effect is stackable.

615046.Name: Interstellar Construct: Inversion Cube
615046.Effect: Increases CRIT Rate of <u>Quake</u> DMG dealt by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> and CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>.
615046.AbridgedEffect: Increases the CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG of the <u>Quake</u> dealt by characters.
615046.EnhancedEffect: Increases CRIT Rate of <u>Quake</u> DMG dealt by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> and CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color>.
615046.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases the CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG of the <u>Quake</u> dealt by characters.

615051.Name: Construct: Sentinel
615051.Effect: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615051.AbridgedEffect: Upon entering battle, all characters gain a Shield.
615051.EnhancedEffect: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615051.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Upon entering battle, all characters gain a Shield.

615052.Name: Construct: Patch
615052.Effect: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>18%</color> of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615052.AbridgedEffect: After being hit, characters gain a Shield based on the HP lost in this attack.
615052.EnhancedEffect: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>18%</color> of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615052.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After being hit, characters gain a Shield based on the HP lost in this attack.

615053.Name: Construct: Compensation
615053.Effect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>14%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615053.AbridgedEffect: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on a target, the character gains a Shield.
615053.EnhancedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>18%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s).
615053.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on a target, the character gains a Shield.

615055.Name: Construct: Rotation
615055.Effect: When a character gains a Shield, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.
615055.AbridgedEffect: When a character receives a Shield, there is a small chance of removing a debuff currently on them.
615055.EnhancedEffect: When a character gains a Shield, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.
615055.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character receives a Shield, there is a small chance of removing a debuff currently on them.

615056.Name: Construct: Burst
615056.Effect: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
615056.AbridgedEffect: Shielded Characters have increased CRIT DMG.
615056.EnhancedEffect: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>.
615056.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Shielded Characters have increased CRIT DMG.

615057.Name: Construct: Concentration
615057.Effect: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color>.
615057.AbridgedEffect: Shielded Characters have increased CRIT Rate.
615057.EnhancedEffect: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color>.
615057.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Shielded Characters have increased CRIT Rate.

615120.Name: Garden of Recollection
615120.Effect: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Remembrance, dealing Ice DMG to all enemies with a high chance of Freezing all enemies for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).

615130.Name: Perfect Experience: Fuli

615130.AbridgedEffect: After attacking a Frozen enemy, apply <u>Dissociation</u> on them.

615130.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After attacking a Frozen enemy, apply <u>Dissociation</u> on them and deal extra DMG.

615131.Name: Perfect Experience: Innocence
615131.Effect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> base chance to apply <u>Dissociation</u> on the enemy for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615131.AbridgedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, apply <u>Dissociation</u> on them.
615131.EnhancedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> base chance to apply <u>Dissociation</u> on the enemy for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). This effect ignores enemies' chance to resist Frozen.
615131.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, ignore the enemy's Freeze RES and apply <u>Dissociation</u> on them.

615132.Name: Perfect Experience: Reticence
615132.Effect: After an enemy is attacked <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> time(s), they have a <color=#f29e38ff>120%</color> base chance to become Frozen for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615132.AbridgedEffect: The enemy has a high chance to become Frozen for every <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> attack(s) it receives.
615132.EnhancedEffect: After an enemy is attacked <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s), they have a <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> base chance to become Frozen for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615132.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The enemy has a high chance to become Frozen for every <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> attack(s) it receives.

615140.Name: Ultimate Experience: Dizziness

615141.AbridgedEffect: When <u>Dissociation</u> is removed from an enemy, there is a chance for them to become Frozen.

615141.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After <u>Dissociation</u> is removed from an enemy, there is a high chance for them to become Frozen.

615142.Name: Ultimate Experience: Hesitance

615142.EnhancedEffect: When Freeze is dispelled, enemy targets deal <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> less DMG, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).

615143.Name: Ultimate Experience: Insight

615143.AbridgedEffect: When a character Freezes an enemy, their Effect Hit Rate increases. After inflicting Freeze on an enemy, the DMG dealt by the character increases.
615143.EnhancedEffect: When a character Freezes an enemy, their Effect Hit Rate increases by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>. After Freezing an enemy, the DMG dealt by the character increases by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615143.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character Freezes an enemy, their Effect Hit Rate increases. After inflicting Freeze on an enemy, the DMG dealt by the character increases.

615144.Name: Ultimate Experience: Shudder

615144.AbridgedEffect: After a character uses their Ultimate, a random enemy gains Ice Weakness.

615144.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character uses their Ultimate, a random enemy without Ice Weakness gains Ice Weakness.

615145.Name: Ultimate Experience: Maverick

615145.AbridgedEffect: Upon entering battle, there is a high chance of inflicting Freeze on all enemies.
615145.EnhancedEffect: Upon entering battle, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> base chance for all enemies to become Frozen and have their SPD reduced by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615145.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Upon entering battle, there is a high chance of inflicting Freeze on all enemy units, as well as lowering their SPD.

615146.Name: Ultimate Experience: Cynicism
615146.Effect: After allies use an attack, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> base chance to inflict the <u>Dissociation</u> state to the attacked target(s). This effect can trigger a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) per enemy target per battle.
615146.AbridgedEffect: After allies use an attack, there is a chance to inflict <u>Dissociation</u> to the attack target.
615146.EnhancedEffect: After allies use an attack, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> base chance to inflict the <u>Dissociation</u> state to the attacked target(s). This effect can trigger a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) per enemy target per battle.
615146.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After allies use an attack, there is a chance to inflict <u>Dissociation</u> to the attack target.

615150.Name: Experience: Chronic Ruin
