615150.AbridgedEffect: Reduces enemy targets' chance to resist being Frozen.
615150.EnhancedEffect: Reduces enemy targets' chance to resist Frozen by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>.
615150.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Reduces enemy targets' chance to resist being Frozen.

615151.Name: Experience: The Torment of Alienation
615151.Effect: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color>.
615151.EnhancedEffect: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color>.

615152.Name: Experience: Lost Memory
615152.Effect: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP percentage to a point that is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> for the first time in this battle, there's a <color=#f29e38ff>70%</color> base chance to Freeze the enemy for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615152.AbridgedEffect: Enemies have a chance of becoming Frozen when they fall to low health from characters' attacks.
615152.EnhancedEffect: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP percentage to a point that is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> for the first time in this battle, there's a <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> base chance to Freeze the enemy for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615152.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Enemies have a high chance of becoming Frozen when they fall to low HP from allies' attacks.

615153.Name: Experience: Stone Cold Hatred
615153.Effect: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color>.
615153.AbridgedEffect: Characters' Skill and Ultimate deal increased DMG against Frozen enemies.
615153.EnhancedEffect: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by <color=#f29e38ff>54%</color>.
615153.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters' Skill and Ultimate deal increased DMG against Frozen enemies.

615154.Name: Experience: Pain & Suffering
615154.Effect: After characters attack a Frozen enemy target, deals Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> of the attacker's ATK.
615154.AbridgedEffect: After attacking a Frozen enemy target, deal Additional DMG.
615154.EnhancedEffect: After characters attack a Frozen enemy target, deals Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of the attacker's ATK.
615154.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After attacking a Frozen enemy target, deal Additional DMG.

615155.Name: Experience: Primordial Hardship
615155.Effect: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color>.
615155.AbridgedEffect: DMG taken by Frozen enemies increases.
615155.EnhancedEffect: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color>.
615155.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: DMG taken by Frozen enemies increases.

615156.Name: Experience: Thrill of Escalation
615156.Effect: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>8</color> Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.
615156.AbridgedEffect: Characters regenerate Energy when they apply Freeze on enemies.
615156.EnhancedEffect: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>12</color> Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.
615156.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters regenerate Energy when they apply Freeze on enemies.

615157.Name: Experience: Responsive Excitement
615157.Effect: When the Freeze on an enemy target is dispelled, the character with the lowest Shield strength gains a Shield that can block DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615157.AbridgedEffect: After the Freeze effect on an enemy is removed, the character with the lowest Shield Effect gains a Shield.
615157.EnhancedEffect: When the Freeze on an enemy target is dispelled, the character with the lowest Shield strength gains a Shield that can block DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615157.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After the Freeze effect on an enemy is removed, the character with the lowest Shield Effect gains a Shield.

615220.Name: Self-Annihilator
615220.Effect: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Nihility. Inflicts Burn, Shock, Bleed, and 2 stacks of Wind Shear to all enemies for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s). After being attacked by a character, the aforementioned DoTs immediately deal DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> of the original DMG.
615220.AbridgedEffect: After triggering the Boundary Equation, inflict Burn, Shock, Bleed, and Wind Shear on all enemies. After receiving a character's attack, the inflicted DoTs can be triggered.

615230.Name: Funeral of Sensory Pursuivant
615230.Effect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, applies <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u>.
615230.AbridgedEffect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, apply <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u> on them.
615230.EnhancedEffect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, apply <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u> on them. After <u>Suspicion</u> reaches 99 stacks for the first time, the provided DoT Vulnerability is no longer affected by the number of stacks and is set at <color=#f29e38ff>120%</color>.
615230.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, apply <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u> on them. After reaching 99 stacks for the first time, DoT Vulnerability increases and is no longer affected by the number of stacks.

615231.Name: An Extra Person's Diary
615231.Effect: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness or attacks a Weakness Broken enemy, inflicts either <color=#f29e38ff>15</color> or <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u>.
615231.AbridgedEffect: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness or attacks a Weakness Broken enemy, inflicts the <u>Suspicion</u> effect on it.
615231.EnhancedEffect: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness or attacks a Weakness Broken enemy, inflicts either <color=#f29e38ff>24</color> or <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u>.
615231.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness or attacks a Weakness Broken enemy, inflicts the <u>Suspicion</u> effect on it.

615232.Name: Why Hasn't Everything Already Disappeared?
615232.Effect: At the beginning of an enemy target's turn, additionally triggers extra DoT DMG calculations <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s), and each DoT status currently on the target immediately deals DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>90%</color> of the original DMG.
615232.AbridgedEffect: At the start of an enemy's turn, all DoT statuses on it are triggered <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> extra time(s).
615232.EnhancedEffect: At the beginning of an enemy target's turn, additionally trigger extra DoT DMG calculations <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s), and each DoT status currently on the target will immediately deal DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>135%</color> of the original DMG.
615232.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: At the start of an enemy's turn, all DoT statuses on it are triggered <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> extra time(s).

615240.Name: Beginning and End
615240.Effect: When an enemy inflicted with <u>Suspicion</u> is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of <u>Suspicion</u> the defeated enemy has on <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> random enemy target(s).
615240.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy afflicted with <u>Suspicion</u> is defeated, transfers the defeated enemy's <u>Suspicion</u> stacks to <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> random enemy target(s).
615240.EnhancedEffect: When an enemy inflicted with <u>Suspicion</u> is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of <u>Suspicion</u> the defeated enemy has on <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> random enemy target(s).
615240.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When an enemy afflicted with <u>Suspicion</u> is defeated, transfers the defeated enemy's <u>Suspicion</u> stacks to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> random enemy target(s).

615241.Name: Caf√© Self-Deceit
615241.Effect: When an enemy has <u>Suspicion</u> on them, inflicts <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> extra stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u>.
615241.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy becomes afflicted with <u>Suspicion</u>, apply <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> extra stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u> on them.
615241.EnhancedEffect: When an enemy is inflicted with <u>Suspicion</u>, the stacks it gains are doubled.
615241.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When an enemy is afflicted with <u>Suspicion</u>, the stacks they gains is doubled.

615242.Name: Fatal Ailment
615242.Effect: After an enemy receives DoT, they deal <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> reduced DMG, stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> time(s) and lasting until the end of the turn.
615242.AbridgedEffect: The more DoTs the enemy takes, the less DMG they deal.
615242.EnhancedEffect: After an enemy receives DoT, they deal <color=#f29e38ff>7%</color> reduced DMG, stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> time(s) and lasting until the end of the turn.
615242.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The more DoTs the enemy takes, the less DMG they deal.

615243.Name: Night Beyond Pyre
615243.Effect: Increases characters' Weakness Break Efficiency by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
615243.EnhancedEffect: Increases characters' Weakness Break Efficiency by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>.

615244.Name: Hell is Other People
615244.Effect: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, deals Break DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>140%</color> of the Weakness Break DMG 1 time to enemies adjacent to it.
615244.AbridgedEffect: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, deals Break DMG to enemies adjacent to it 1 time.
615244.EnhancedEffect: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, deals Break DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>210%</color> of the Weakness Break DMG 1 time to all other enemy targets.
615244.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, deals Break DMG to other enemies 1 time.

615245.Name: All Things are Possible
615245.Effect: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the DoT.
615245.AbridgedEffect: If an enemy is under any DoT status when receiving an attack, they will take DMG from a random DoT on them.
615245.EnhancedEffect: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> of the DoT.
615245.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: If an enemy is under any DoT status when receiving an attack, they will take DMG from a random DoT on them.

615246.Name: Path Through the Woods
615246.Effect: When enemy targets enter battle, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>30</color> stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u>.
615246.AbridgedEffect: When enemy targets enter battle, they receive <u>Suspicion</u>.
615246.EnhancedEffect: When enemy targets enter battle, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>45</color> stack(s) of <u>Suspicion</u>.
615246.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When enemy targets enter battle, they receive <u>Suspicion</u>.

615250.Name: Ignosticism
615250.Effect: DoT effects applied by characters deal <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> more DMG.
615250.EnhancedEffect: DoT effects applied by characters deal <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color> more DMG.

615253.Name: Tragic Lecture
615253.Effect: Increases DoT taken by enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color>.
615253.AbridgedEffect: Enemies take increased DMG from DoTs.
615253.EnhancedEffect: Increases DoT taken by enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color>.
615253.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Enemies take increased DMG from DoTs.

615254.Name: Self-Manifestation
615254.Effect: Reduces DEF of enemies with their Weakness Broken by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color>.
615254.AbridgedEffect: Enemies with their Weakness Broken have their DEF reduced.
615254.EnhancedEffect: Reduces DEF of enemies with their Weakness Broken by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>.
615254.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Enemies with their Weakness Broken have their DEF reduced.

615255.Name: Emotional Decluttering
615255.Effect: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> time(s).
615255.AbridgedEffect: The more DoTs the enemy has, the more DMG they will receive from all sources.
615255.EnhancedEffect: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by <color=#f29e38ff>4%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s).
615255.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The more DoTs the enemy has, the more DMG they will receive from all sources.

615256.Name: Offerings of Deception
615256.Effect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>1.0%</color> of their respective Max HP.
615256.AbridgedEffect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all characters restore HP.
615256.EnhancedEffect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>1.5%</color> of their respective Max HP.
615256.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all characters restore HP.

615257.Name: Before Sunrise
615257.Effect: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>2.0</color> Energy for a random ally. Enemies can trigger this effect for a max of <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> time(s) in one turn.
615257.AbridgedEffect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, a random ally regenerates Energy.
615257.EnhancedEffect: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>3.0</color> Energy for a random ally. Enemies can trigger this effect for a max of <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> time(s) in one turn.
615257.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, a random ally regenerates Energy.

615320.Name: Elixir Seekers
615320.Effect: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Abundance, restoring HP for all allies by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the triggering character's Max HP, dispelling all debuffs, and applying <u>Purgatorial Eradication</u>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s).
615320.AbridgedEffect: After triggering the boundary Equation, restores HP for all allies and dispels all debuffs while providing the <u>Purgatorial Eradication</u> state.

615330.Name: Perennial Prosperity, Lush Longevity
615330.Effect: Charges <u>Dewdrop</u> when a character receives healing. The Charge value is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the amount of HP restored.
615330.AbridgedEffect: When a character receives healing, "<u>Dewdrop</u>" is Charged according to the amount of HP restored.
615330.EnhancedEffect: Charges <u>Dewdrop</u> when a character receives healing. The Charge value is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the amount of HP restored, and increases <u>Dewdrop</u>'s DMG multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> of the original multiplier.
615330.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character receives healing, "<u>Dewdrop</u>" is Charged according to the amount of HP restored, and DMG done by "<u>Dewdrop</u>" is increased.

615331.Name: Mudra of Blessing
615331.Effect: Charges "<u>Dewdrop</u>" at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of their current HP.
615331.AbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins, "<u>Dewdrop</u>" is Charged based on the character's current HP.
615331.EnhancedEffect: Charges "<u>Dewdrop</u>" at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>70%</color> of their Max HP.
615331.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins, "<u>Dewdrop</u>" is Charged based on the character's Max HP.

615332.Name: All Abundance in One Mind
615332.Effect: When a character provides healing, ally targets other than the healed target will also gain HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of the HP restored.
615332.AbridgedEffect: Healing effects provided by characters can be Blasted to all allies.
615332.EnhancedEffect: Characters' Max HP increases by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>. When a character provides healing, ally targets other than the healed target will also gain HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> of the HP restored.
615332.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases Max HP. Healing effects provided by characters can be Blasted to all allies.

615340.Name: Sin Dead, Grace Born
615340.Effect: Restores HP to the character equal to <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of the Charge value when "<u>Dewdrop</u>" ruptures, up to <color=#f29e38ff>18%</color> of the character's Max HP.
615340.AbridgedEffect: Restores the character's HP when "<u>Dewdrop</u>" breaks.
615340.EnhancedEffect: Restores HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of the Charge value when "<u>Dewdrop</u>" ruptures, up to <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> of the character's Max HP and no less than <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color> of their Max HP.
615340.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Restores the character's HP to above a minimum value when "<u>Dewdrop</u>" breaks.

615341.Name: The Blessed Many
615341.Effect: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for "<u>Dewdrop</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color>.
615341.AbridgedEffect: When a character's HP is full, "<u>Dewdrop</u>'s" Charging Efficiency increases.
615341.EnhancedEffect: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for "<u>Dewdrop</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>120%</color>.
615341.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's HP is full, "<u>Dewdrop</u>'s" Charging Efficiency increases.

615342.Name: Candlelight Radiance
615342.Effect: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of both units by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615342.AbridgedEffect: When a character restores an ally's HP, both units' ATK increases.
615342.EnhancedEffect: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of all allies by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615342.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character restores an ally's HP, all allies' ATK increases.

615343.Name: Bitter Is the Bane
615343.Effect: After launching attacks, characters deal Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color> of their current HP.
615343.AbridgedEffect: After a character uses an attack, they deal Additional DMG based on their current HP.
615343.EnhancedEffect: Whenever a character attacks, deals Additional DMG to the enemy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>42%</color> of the character's Max HP.
615343.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character uses an attack, they deal Additional DMG based on their Max HP.

615344.Name: Corporeal Pellucidity
615344.Effect: When a character's HP is fully restored, reduces their DMG received by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> and increases Effect RES by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> until after they are attacked.
615344.AbridgedEffect: When a character's HP is fully restored, their DMG received is reduced and Effect RES is increased until after they are attacked.
615344.EnhancedEffect: When a character's HP is fully restored, reduces their DMG received by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> and increases Effect RES by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> until after they are attacked.
615344.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's HP is fully restored, their DMG received is reduced and Effect RES is increased until after they are attacked.

615345.Name: Prajna Voyage
615345.Effect: When being healed by an ally target, characters restore extra HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of the amount of HP restored.
615345.AbridgedEffect: Characters that have their HP restored by an ally also restore extra HP.
615345.EnhancedEffect: When being healed by an ally target, characters restore extra HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color> of the amount of HP restored.
615345.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters that have their HP restored by an ally also restore extra HP.

615346.Name: Offering of Incinerated Flesh
615346.Effect: "<u>Dewdrop</u>" DMG caused by characters increase its CRIT Rate by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> and CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>.
615346.AbridgedEffect: Increases the CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG of "<u>Dewdrop</u>" DMG dealt by characters.
615346.EnhancedEffect: "<u>Dewdrop</u>" DMG caused by characters increase its CRIT Rate by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> and CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color>.
615346.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases the CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG of "<u>Dewdrop</u>" DMG dealt by characters.

615350.Name: Dharma Rain
615350.Effect: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, increases their Max HP by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615350.AbridgedEffect: When a character's restored HP exceeds Max HP, their Max HP increases.
615350.EnhancedEffect: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, increases their Max HP by <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615350.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's restored HP exceeds Max HP, their Max HP increases.

615351.Name: Dew Delight
615351.AbridgedEffect: Increases the amount of HP restored by characters.
615351.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases the amount of HP restored by characters.

615352.Name: Extended Life
615352.Effect: When a character has their HP percentage lowered to below <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> for the first time in battle, they restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of their Max HP.
615352.AbridgedEffect: When a character has their HP percentage lowered to below <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> for the first time, their HP is restored.
615352.EnhancedEffect: When a character has their HP percentage lowered to below <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> for the first time in battle, they restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color> of their Max HP.
615352.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character has their HP percentage lowered to below <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> for the first time, their HP is restored.

615353.Name: Mudra
615353.Effect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color> of their Max HP.
615353.AbridgedEffect: Characters restore HP after inflicting Weakness Break on enemies.
615353.EnhancedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> of their Max HP.
615353.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters restore HP after inflicting Weakness Break on enemies.

615354.Name: Peril Parry
615354.Effect: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615354.AbridgedEffect: After having their HP restored, the character's DEF increases.
615354.EnhancedEffect: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615354.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After having their HP restored, the character's DEF increases.

615355.Name: Back to Life
615355.Effect: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color> of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.
615355.AbridgedEffect: After restoring an ally's HP, the healer character also restores HP.
615355.EnhancedEffect: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>18%</color> of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.
615355.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After restoring an ally's HP, the healer character also restores HP.

615356.Name: Force Victoire
615356.Effect: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615356.AbridgedEffect: After having their HP restored, the character's SPD increases.
615356.EnhancedEffect: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615356.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After having their HP restored, the character's SPD increases.

615357.Name: Anointment
615357.Effect: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, there's a <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff on the character. This effect can be triggered up to <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) per turn.
615357.AbridgedEffect: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, there is a chance to dispel 1 debuff currently on them.
615357.EnhancedEffect: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, there's a <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff on the character. This effect can be triggered up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s) per turn.
615357.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, there is a chance to dispel 1 debuff currently on them.

615420.Name: Galaxy Ranger
615420.Effect: Spends 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of The Hunt, dealing Wind DMG to all enemies and Advances all allies' actions by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>, with the Max Energy being 200.
615420.AbridgedEffect: After triggering the boundary Equation, deals Wind DMG to all enemies and Advances all allies' actions by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>, with the Max Energy being 200.

615430.Name: Empyrean Imperium
615430.Effect: When a character's turn begins, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
615430.AbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
615430.EnhancedEffect: When a character's turn begins, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u> and sets the stack limit of <u>Critical Boost</u> to <color=#f29e38ff>12</color>.
615430.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u> and raises the stack limit of <u>Critical Boost</u>.

615431.Name: Radiant Supreme
615431.Effect: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
615431.AbridgedEffect: After defeating an enemy, the character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
615431.EnhancedEffect: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>7</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
615431.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After defeating an enemy, the character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>7</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.

615432.Name: Sovereign Skybreaker
615432.Effect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by 100% and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>.
615432.AbridgedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by 100% and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack.
615432.EnhancedEffect: After a character Breaks enemy targets' Weakness, their action Advances Forward by 100% and the DMG they deal increases by <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color>. The DMG Boost effect stacks up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s) and lasts until the character is attacked.
615432.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by 100% and their DMG dealt increases. The DMG Boost effect can stack and lasts until the character is attacked.

615440.Name: Skyward Vendetta
615440.Effect: If a character has higher than 100% CRIT Rate and currently has "<u>Critical Boost</u>," for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds 100%, CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by a max of <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color>.
615440.AbridgedEffect: When a character has <u>Critical Boost</u>, their excess CRIT Rate turns into CRIT DMG.
615440.EnhancedEffect: If a character has higher than 100% CRIT Rate and currently has "<u>Critical Boost</u>," for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds 100%, CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by a max of <color=#f29e38ff>240%</color>.
615440.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character has <u>Critical Boost</u>, their excess CRIT Rate turns into CRIT DMG.

615441.Name: Adept's Bow
615441.Effect: When any ally uses their Ultimate, they can inherit <u>Critical Boost</u>, and the number of <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks increases by <color=#f29e38ff>1</color>.
615441.AbridgedEffect: Ultimates can inherit and increase <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks.
615441.EnhancedEffect: When any ally uses their Ultimate or performs a Follow-up ATK, they can inherit <u>Critical Boost</u>, and the number of <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks increases by <color=#f29e38ff>1</color>.
615441.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Follow-up ATKs and Ultimates can inherit and increase <u>"Critical Boost"</u> stacks.

615442.Name: Mistwraith Pursuit
615442.Effect: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s).
615442.AbridgedEffect: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases.
615442.EnhancedEffect: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> times and gives a <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect cannot be triggered repeatedly.
615442.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases, and there's a chance of recovering a Skill Point.

615443.Name: Starward Demonhunt
615443.Effect: After a character launches an attack, reduces their DMG taken by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>. This effect stacks up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s) and lasts until character is attacked.
615443.AbridgedEffect: After a character launches an attack, reduces DMG taken by them. This effect can stack and lasts until the character is attacked.
615443.EnhancedEffect: After a character launches an attack, reduces their DMG taken by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>. This effect stacks up to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s) and lasts until character is attacked.
615443.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character launches an attack, reduces DMG taken by them. This effect can stack and lasts until the character is attacked.

615444.Name: Borisin Chase
615444.Effect: After every <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character.
615444.AbridgedEffect: Every time a certain number of turns had passed, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%.
615444.EnhancedEffect: After every <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character. Upon entering battle, <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> turn(s) are considered to have already passed.
615444.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Every time a certain number of turns had passed, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. Upon entering a battle, a certain number of turns is considered to have already passed.

615445.Name: Rainbow Fang
615445.Effect: When a character defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of their respective Max HP and increases their ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615445.AbridgedEffect: After a character defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP and increases their ATK.
615445.EnhancedEffect: When a character defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color> of their respective Max HP and increases their ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615445.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP and increases their ATK.

615446.Name: Plague-Purging Warfare
615446.Effect: If a character has <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> stack(s) or higher of <u>Critical Boost</u> at the start of their turn, their SPD increases by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615446.AbridgedEffect: When a character's turn starts, receive a SPD Boost if they have <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> stacks or higher of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
615446.EnhancedEffect: If a character has <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> stack(s) or higher of <u>Critical Boost</u> at the start of their turn, their SPD increases by <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615446.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's turn starts, receive a SPD Boost if they have <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> stacks or higher of <u>Critical Boost</u>.

615453.Name: Thundering Chariot
615453.Effect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>.
615453.AbridgedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the enemy's action is delayed.
615453.EnhancedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
615453.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the enemy's action is delayed.

615454.Name: Constellation Surge
615454.Effect: After characters Break an enemy's Weakness, increases their SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>, lasting until the character is attacked.
615454.AbridgedEffect: After a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, SPD increases. Lasts until the character is attacked.
615454.EnhancedEffect: After characters Break an enemy's Weakness, increases their SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>, lasting until the character is attacked.
615454.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, SPD increases. Lasts until the character is attacked.

615455.Name: Astral Menace
615455.Effect: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color>.
615455.AbridgedEffect: When a character's turn ends, their action is Advanced Forward.
615455.EnhancedEffect: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>.
615455.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's turn ends, their action is Advanced Forward.

615456.Name: Arboreal Volley
615456.Effect: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> Energy.
615456.AbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins, regenerate their Energy.
615456.EnhancedEffect: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> Energy.
615456.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins, regenerate their Energy.

615457.Name: Arrow Shades Bow
615457.Effect: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.
615457.AbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins after an ally has completed their turn, increase ATK based on the previous ally who had acted.
615457.EnhancedEffect: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.
615457.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins after an ally has completed their turn, increase ATK based on the previous ally who had acted.

615520.Name: Antimatter Legion
615520.Effect: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Destruction, dealing Fire DMG to all enemies. Whenever a character is attacked or loses HP, they will gain an additional hit of DMG the next time the Boundary Resonance is triggered, up to <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> hits.
615520.AbridgedEffect: After triggering the boundary Equation, deals Fire DMG to all enemies. Whenever a character is attacked or loses HP, they will gain an additional hit of DMG next time.

615530.Name: Quasar Meltdown Constant
615530.Effect: Every time a character loses or heals <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of their HP, obtain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of the <u>Grit</u> effect, with up to <color=#f29e38ff>8</color> stacks can be obtained each turn. When the total HP lost or restored equals to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of HP, increases the character's Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
615530.AbridgedEffect: For every certain percentage of HP that characters lose or heal themselves by, they gain <u>Grit</u>. After cumulatively losing or healing by a certain amount of HP, Break Effect is increased.
615530.EnhancedEffect: Every time a character loses or heals <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color> of their HP, obtain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of the <u>Grit</u> effect, with up to <color=#f29e38ff>12</color> stacks can be obtained each turn. When the total HP lost or restored equals to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of HP, increases the character's Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>.
615530.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: For every certain percentage of HP that characters lose or heal themselves by, they gain <u>Grit</u>. After cumulatively losing or healing by a certain amount of HP, Break Effect is increased.

615531.Name: Boundary Density Expansion Group
615531.Effect: Every time a character loses or heals HP, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of the <u>Grit</u> effect. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time for each attack taken.
615531.AbridgedEffect: Every time a character loses HP or heals themselves, they gain <u>Grit</u>.
615531.EnhancedEffect: Every time a character loses or has HP restored, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of the <u>Grit</u> effect and randomly grants <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> of their other teammates <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of the <u>Grit</u> effect. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time for each attack taken.
615531.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Every time a character loses HP or heals themselves, they gain <u>Grit</u> and grant random teammates <u>Grit</u>.

615532.Name: Regression Inequality of Annihilation
615532.Effect: When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is distributed among all allies.
615532.EnhancedEffect: Receives <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> less DMG. When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is distributed among all allies.
615532.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: All allies split incoming DMG, and reduces the DMG taken by targeted character.

615540.Name: Catastrophic Resonance
615540.Effect: When characters with <u>Grit</u> use their Basic ATK/Skill/Ultimate to deal DMG, increases DMG taken by enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color>. When <u>Grit</u> reaches more than <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> stacks, additionally increases Break DMG taken by enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
615540.AbridgedEffect: When characters with <u>Grit</u> use their abilities, the DMG they deal to enemies increases. When <u>Grit</u> reaches more than a certain number of stacks, additionally increases Break DMG taken by enemies.
615540.EnhancedEffect: When characters with <u>Grit</u> use their Basic ATK/Skill/Ultimate to deal DMG, increases DMG taken by enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color>. When <u>Grit</u> reaches more than <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> stacks, additionally increases Break DMG taken by enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>.
615540.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When characters with <u>Grit</u> use their abilities, the DMG they deal to enemies increases. When <u>Grit</u> reaches more than a certain number of stacks, additionally increases Break DMG taken by enemies.

615541.Name: Indicative Depth of Field
615541.Effect: Characters with <u>Grit</u> will receive <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color> less DMG. When their HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, additionally reduces DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color>.
615541.AbridgedEffect: Characters with <u>Grit</u> will take less DMG. When their HP is low, DMG taken is additionally reduced.
615541.EnhancedEffect: Characters with <u>Grit</u> will receive <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> less DMG. When their HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, additionally reduces DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>.
615541.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters with <u>Grit</u> will take less DMG. When their HP is low, DMG taken is additionally reduced.

615542.Name: Tide of Devastation
615542.Effect: After a character loses or heals themselves for <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> accumulated HP, the next time they attack a Weakness Broken enemy, converts the Toughness Reduction of the attack into 1 instance of <color=#f29e38ff>70%</color> <u>Super Break DMG</u>.
615542.AbridgedEffect: After a character loses HP or heals themselves for <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> in total, they will deal <u>Super Break DMG</u> after they attack Weakness Broken enemy targets.
615542.EnhancedEffect: After a character loses or heals themselves for <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> accumulated HP, the next time they attack a Weakness Broken enemy, converts the Toughness Reduction of the attack into 1 instance of <color=#f29e38ff>105%</color> <u>Super Break DMG</u>.
615542.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character loses HP or heals themselves for <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> in total, they will deal <u>Super Break DMG</u> after they attack Weakness Broken enemy targets.

615543.Name: Decaying Implosion
615543.Effect: After a character loses HP or heals themselves for <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> in total, increase their All-Type RES PEN by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color>, which additionally increases Super Break DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>.
615543.AbridgedEffect: After a character loses HP or heals themselves for <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> in total, increases their All-Type RES PEN, which is additionally increased when they deal Break DMG.
615543.EnhancedEffect: After a character loses HP or heals themselves for <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> in total, increase their All-Type RES PEN by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color>, which additionally increases Super Break DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
615543.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character loses HP or heals themselves for <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> in total, increases their All-Type RES PEN, which is additionally increased when they deal Break DMG.

615544.Name: Disciplinary Flicker
615544.Effect: If a character's HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> after being attacked or losing HP, restores their HP by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color> of their Max HP.
615544.AbridgedEffect: When a character is hit or have their HP lowered, their HP is restored if their current HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color>.
615544.EnhancedEffect: If a character's HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> after being attacked or losing HP, restores their HP by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color> of their Max HP. The lower the current HP is, the more HP will be restored this way, but no more than <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>.
615544.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character is hit or have their HP lowered, their HP is restored if their current HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color>. The lower their HP is, the more HP is restored.

615545.Name: Disruptive Pulse
615545.Effect: When a character's HP percentage falls lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, restores a set amount of Energy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of the character's Max Energy. This effect can only trigger again after <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> turn(s).
615545.AbridgedEffect: When a character has their HP percentage lowered to below <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, their Energy is regenerated.
615545.EnhancedEffect: When a character's HP percentage falls lower than <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>, restores a set amount of Energy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of the character's Max Energy and <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> Skill Point(s). This effect can only trigger again after <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> turn(s).
615545.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character has their HP percentage lowered to below <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>, their Energy is regenerated and Skill Points are recovered.

615546.Name: Regressive Bull Market
615546.Effect: When characters enter battle, gain <color=#f29e38ff>12</color> stack(s) of <u>Grit</u>.
615546.EnhancedEffect: When characters enter battle, gain <color=#f29e38ff>18</color> stack(s) of <u>Grit</u>.

615551.Name: Reflection
615551.Effect: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color> of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) per battle.
615551.AbridgedEffect: Characters can resist fatal attacks and restore their own HP. This can take effect a limited number of times among all allies.
615551.EnhancedEffect: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) per battle.
615551.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters can resist fatal attacks and restore their own HP. This can take effect a limited number of times among all allies.

615553.Name: Quasar Jet
615553.Effect: Increases Break DMG taken by enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color>.
615553.EnhancedEffect: Increases Break DMG taken by enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color>.

615554.Name: Metric Reservation
615554.Effect: Upon entering battle, characters consume their HP by an amount equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of their Max HP, and gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s).
615554.AbridgedEffect: Upon entering battle, characters will consume their HP to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> and gain a Shield.
615554.EnhancedEffect: Upon entering battle, characters consume their HP by an amount equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of their Max HP, and gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s).
615554.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Upon entering battle, characters will consume their HP to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> and gain a Shield.

615555.Name: Sentinel Satellite
615555.Effect: When a character's HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of their Max HP for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s). This effect can only be triggered <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) by each character per battle.
615555.AbridgedEffect: When a character's current HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, they receive a Shield. This buff can only be triggered a limited number of times.
615555.EnhancedEffect: When a character's HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of their Max HP for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s). This effect can only be triggered <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) by each character per battle.
615555.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's current HP percentage is lower than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, they receive a Shield. This buff can only be triggered a limited number of times.

615556.Name: Polarization Receptor
615556.Effect: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their DEF by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> until the start of the next turn.
615556.AbridgedEffect: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their DEF.
615556.EnhancedEffect: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their DEF by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color> until the start of the next turn.
615556.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their DEF.

615557.Name: Eternally Collapsing Object
615557.Effect: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their Effect RES by <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color> until the start of the next turn.
615557.AbridgedEffect: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their Effect RES.
615557.EnhancedEffect: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their Effect RES by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> until the start of the next turn.
615557.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their Effect RES.

615620.Name: Masked Fools
615620.Effect: Can consume 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Elation, dealing Follow-up ATK DMG of a random Type to all enemies for <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> ‚Äì <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> time(s). And all allies' Basic ATK/Skill/Ultimate DMG are all considered as Follow-up ATK DMG, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615620.AbridgedEffect: After triggering the boundary Equation, deals Follow-up ATK DMG of a random Type to all enemies for a random number of times and causes all allies' Basic ATK/Skill/Ultimate DMG to be considered as Follow-up ATK DMG.

615630.Name: Vineyard: Against the Night
615630.Effect: Every time a character uses a Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate, they will additionally deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG 1 time equal to <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of their ATK after the next time a Follow-up ATK is launched. This status can deal DMG up to <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s).
615630.AbridgedEffect: Every time a character uses a Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate, they will additionally deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG after the next time a Follow-up ATK is launched.
615630.EnhancedEffect: Every time a character uses a Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate, they will additionally deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG 1 time equal to <color=#f29e38ff>120%</color> of their ATK after the next time a Follow-up ATK is launched. This status can deal DMG up to <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s).
615630.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Every time a character uses a Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate, they will additionally deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG after the next time a Follow-up ATK is launched.

615631.Name: Slaughterhouse No. 4: Rest in Peace
615631.Effect: When characters launch Follow-up ATKs to an enemy, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> extra time(s).
615631.AbridgedEffect: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG 1 time. If the enemy currently has their Weakness Broken, then deal this DMG <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> extra time(s).
615631.EnhancedEffect: When characters launch Follow-up ATKs to an enemy, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> extra time(s).
615631.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG 1 time. If the enemy currently has their Weakness Broken, then deal this DMG <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> extra time(s).

615632.Name: Invitation to a Beheading: Weeping Blackbox
615632.Effect: When a character launches a Follow-up ATK on an enemy, the enemy's action is delayed by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>. This can trigger a max of <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s) per enemy target's turn.
615632.AbridgedEffect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK on enemies, the enemies' action is delayed.
615632.EnhancedEffect: When a character launches a Follow-up ATK on an enemy, the enemy's action is delayed by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>. This can trigger a max of <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s) per enemy target's turn.
615632.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK on enemies, the enemies' action is delayed.

615640.Name: Portrait of A Man On Fire
615640.Effect: When causing <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG to an enemy, characters deal additional <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG of different Types for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s), at DMG values equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of the original DMG.
615640.AbridgedEffect: Every time enemies receive <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG, they also receive extra <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s).
615640.EnhancedEffect: When causing <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG to an enemy, characters deal additional <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG of different Types for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s), at DMG values equal to <color=#f29e38ff>90%</color> of the original DMG.
615640.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Every time enemies receive <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG, they also receive extra <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s).

615641.Name: The Hourglass Kindergarten
615641.Effect: For every 1 Type of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>4%</color> until the end of their next action.
615641.AbridgedEffect: The more DMG Types an enemy receives from <u>Aftertaste</u>, the more their ATK is reduced.
615641.EnhancedEffect: For every 1 Type of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>6%</color> until the end of their next action.
615641.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The more DMG Types an enemy receives from <u>Aftertaste</u>, the more their ATK is reduced.

615642.Name: The Painted Albatross
615642.Effect: For each enemy hit by a character's Follow-up ATK, the character deals Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> of their ATK to all enemies hit.
615642.AbridgedEffect: Deals Additional DMG based on the number of enemies hit by Follow-up ATK.
615642.EnhancedEffect: For each enemy hit by a character's Follow-up ATK, the character deals Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color> of their ATK to all enemies hit.
615642.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Deals Additional DMG based on the number of enemies hit by Follow-up ATK.

615643.Name: 12 Monkeys and Angry Men
615643.Effect: When a character deals Follow-up ATK DMG to an enemy target, increases Follow-up ATK DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>4%</color>, stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff>24</color> time(s) and lasting until the start of the next turn.
615643.AbridgedEffect: The more instances of Follow-up ATK DMG a character deals to the enemy target, the higher the Follow-up ATK DMG becomes. This effect lasts until the start of the next turn.
615643.EnhancedEffect: When a character deals Follow-up ATK DMG to an enemy target, increases Follow-up ATK DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color>, stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff>30</color> time(s) and lasting until the start of the next turn.
615643.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The more instances of Follow-up ATK DMG a character deals to the enemy target, the higher the Follow-up ATK DMG becomes. This effect lasts until the start of the next turn.

615644.Name: As Good As Fleming
615644.Effect: When a character uses a Follow-up ATK on an enemy target, increases DMG received by the target by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color> for a max of <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s), lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615644.AbridgedEffect: The more Follow-up ATKs the characters launch on enemy targets, the more DMG targets receive.
615644.EnhancedEffect: When a character uses a Follow-up ATK on an enemy target, increases DMG received by the target by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color> for a max of <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s), lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615644.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The more Follow-up ATKs the characters launch on enemy targets, the more DMG targets receive.

615645.Name: A Fish Discovered Fire
615645.Effect: Characters' Follow-up ATK DMG ignores <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of the target's DEF.
615645.AbridgedEffect: Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters ignores a certain proportion of the enemy target's DEF.
615645.EnhancedEffect: Characters' Follow-up ATK DMG ignores <color=#f29e38ff>27%</color> of the target's DEF.
615645.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters ignores a certain proportion of the enemy target's DEF.

615646.Name: Last of the Taraka
615646.Effect: <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG dealt by characters increases by <color=#f29e38ff>70%</color>.
615646.AbridgedEffect: Increase the DMG dealt by <u>Aftertaste</u> triggered by characters.
615646.EnhancedEffect: <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG dealt by characters increases by <color=#f29e38ff>105%</color>.
615646.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increase the DMG dealt by <u>Aftertaste</u> triggered by characters.

615650.Name: Behold Those Fools
615650.Effect: Increases the CRIT DMG of Follow-up ATKs by <color=#f29e38ff>44%</color>.
615650.AbridgedEffect: Increases the CRIT DMG of characters' Follow-up ATK.
615650.EnhancedEffect: Increases the CRIT DMG of Follow-up ATKs by <color=#f29e38ff>66%</color>.
615650.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases the CRIT DMG of characters' Follow-up ATK.

615651.Name: Mostly Harmful
615651.Effect: The Weakness Break Efficiency increases by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> when characters deal Follow-up ATK DMG.
615651.AbridgedEffect: Follow-up ATKs' Weakness Break Efficiency increases.
615651.EnhancedEffect: The Weakness Break Efficiency increases by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> when characters deal Follow-up ATK DMG.
615651.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Follow-up ATKs' Weakness Break Efficiency increases.

615652.Name: Suspiria
615652.Effect: Increases characters' Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>26%</color>.
615652.EnhancedEffect: Increases characters' Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>39%</color>.

615653.Name: Pale Fire
615653.Effect: Increases the CRIT Rate for Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>26%</color>.
615653.EnhancedEffect: Increases the CRIT Rate for Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>39%</color>.

615654.Name: Back to the Lighthouse
615654.Effect: When characters use a Follow-up ATK, restore <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> Energy. This effect can be triggered up to <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) per turn.
615654.AbridgedEffect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, they regenerate Energy.
615654.EnhancedEffect: When characters use a Follow-up ATK, restore <color=#f29e38ff>8</color> Energy. This effect can be triggered up to <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) per turn.
615654.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, they regenerate Energy.

615655.Name: Doctor of Love
615655.Effect: After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, restores their HP by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of their Max HP.
615655.AbridgedEffect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, they restore HP.
615655.EnhancedEffect: After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, restores their HP by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> of their Max HP.
615655.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, they restore HP.

615656.Name: Platinum Age
615656.Effect: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increase their DEF by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).

615656.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, their DEF increases.

615657.Name: Clockwork Apple
615657.Effect: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increases SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615657.AbridgedEffect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, their SPD increases.
615657.EnhancedEffect: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increases SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).

615720.Name: Swarm King Progeny
615720.Effect: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and trigger Boundary Resonance with the Path of Propagation. Enables a target ally to immediately take action and recover <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> Skill Point(s). Gains the <u>Levitation</u> effect. When any enemy unit gets defeated by a character that has <u>Levitation</u>, Boundary Equation regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>50</color> Energy, with the Max Energy set at 200.
615720.AbridgedEffect: After triggering the boundary Equation, causes a designated allied target to immediately take action and recovers <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> Skill Point(s) while gaining the <u>Levitation</u> effect. When any enemy unit gets defeated by a character that has <u>Levitation</u>, Boundary Equation regenerates Energy, with the Max Energy set at 200.

615730.Name: Spore Discharge
615730.Effect: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> <u>Spore(s)</u>.
615730.AbridgedEffect: When a character consumes Skill Points, causes all enemies to receive <u>Spores</u>.
615730.EnhancedEffect: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> <u>Spores</u>. When all Skill Points are consumed, the SPD of the character who consumed the last Skill Point increases by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615730.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character consumes Skill Points, causes all enemies to receive <u>Spores</u>. If Skill Points are consumed to 0, increases the character's SPD.

615731.Name: Fungal Pustule
615731.Effect: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 <u>Spore</u> to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> random enemy target(s).
615731.AbridgedEffect: When a character recovers Skill Points, causes a random enemy to receive <u>Spores</u>.
615731.EnhancedEffect: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 <u>Spore</u> to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> random enemy target(s). The max number of <u>Spores</u> increases by <color=#f29e38ff>3</color>.
615731.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character recovers Skill Points, causes a random enemy to receive <u>Spores</u>. Increases the number of <u>Spores</u> they can bear.

615732.Name: Scythe Limbs
615732.Effect: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed. For each Skill Point consumed, the character's CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s), lasting until the character uses an attack.
615732.AbridgedEffect: After a character uses an Ultimate, when a Skill Point is consumed, it is considered as additionally consuming 1 Skill Point. The more Skill Points a character consumes, the higher their CRIT DMG.
615732.EnhancedEffect: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume or recover Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed or recovered. For each Skill Point consumed or recovered, the character's CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s), lasting until after the character uses an attack.
615732.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character uses an Ultimate, when a Skill Point is consumed or recovered, it is considered as additionally consuming or recovering 1 Skill Point. The more Skill Points a character consumes or recovers, the higher their CRIT DMG.

615740.Name: Putrefaction Ulcer
615740.Effect: Changes the number of times <u>Spores</u> can spread after bursting to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> times. Can also spread to the original bearer of <u>Spores</u>.
615740.AbridgedEffect: The number of times <u>Spores</u> can spread after bursting increases. Can also spread to the original bearer.
615740.EnhancedEffect: Changes the number of times <u>Spores</u> can spread after bursting to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> times. Can also spread to the original bearer of <u>Spores</u>.
615740.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The number of times <u>Spores</u> can spread after bursting increases. Can also spread to the original bearer.

615741.Name: Lytic Enzyme
615741.Effect: Increases the DMG caused by <u>Spores</u> bursting. The DMG increased is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the <u>Spores</u> they were carrying will spread to targets adjacent to them.
615741.AbridgedEffect: Increases DMG dealt by <u>Spores</u>. After an enemy is defeated, enemies adjacent to it will receive its <u>Spores</u>.
615741.EnhancedEffect: Increases the DMG caused by <u>Spores</u> bursting. The DMG increased is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the <u>Spores</u> they were carrying will spread to other enemy targets.
615741.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases DMG dealt by <u>Spores</u>. After an enemy is defeated, other enemies will receive its <u>Spores</u>.

615742.Name: Excitatory Gland
615742.Effect: Increases the Basic ATK DMG dealt by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>. After consuming Skill Points, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
615742.AbridgedEffect: Increases a character's Basic ATK DMG dealt. After consuming Skill Points, there is a chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
615742.EnhancedEffect: Increases the Basic ATK DMG dealt by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. After consuming Skill Points, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
615742.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases a character's Basic ATK DMG dealt. After consuming Skill Points, there is a chance to recover 1 Skill Point.

615743.Name: Exposed Brain Matter
615743.Effect: DMG dealt by characters' Basic ATK also deals DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of the original DMG to a random adjacent target.
615743.AbridgedEffect: Basic ATK DMG will Blast a random adjacent target.
615743.EnhancedEffect: DMG dealt by characters' Basic ATK also deals DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> of the original DMG to adjacent targets.
615743.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Basic ATK DMG will Blast adjacent targets.

615744.Name: Intersegmental Membrane
615744.Effect: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them decreases by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s).
615744.AbridgedEffect: The more Skill Points a character consumes, the lower the DMG they receive.
615744.EnhancedEffect: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them decreases by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s).
615744.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The more Skill Points a character consumes, the lower the DMG they receive.

615745.Name: Catalyst

615745.AbridgedEffect: If, after a character uses their Skill, the Skill does not initiate an attack, increases the DMG of all allies.

615746.Name: Blocker Amine

615746.EnhancedEffect: After enemy targets receive DMG from <u>Spores</u>, their DEF decreases by <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> stack(s).

615820.Name: Astral Ecology School
615820.Effect: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Erudition. Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all enemies. Additionally, links the enemy with the highest Max HP with other enemies, inflicting <u>Central Link</u> on all enemies and regenerating Energy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of Max Energy to all allies.

615830.Name: BCI<unbreak>-34</unbreak> Gray Matter
615830.Effect: When entering battle, charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>65%</color>. Breaking an enemy's Weakness charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color>.

615830.EnhancedEffect: When entering battle, charges <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. Breaking an enemy's Weakness or attacking Weakness Broken enemies will charge <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> or <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> respectively. This effect can only be triggered once by each enemy during each attack.
615830.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When entering battle, charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>. Breaking an enemy's Weakness or attacking Weakness Broken enemies charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>.

615831.Name: SMR-2 Amygdala
615831.Effect: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies will charge the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>.
615831.AbridgedEffect: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>.
615831.EnhancedEffect: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> is fully charged, characters' SPD increases by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615831.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>. Every time the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> is fully charged, gains a SPD bonus.

615832.Name: VEP<unbreak>-18</unbreak> Occipital Lobe
615832.Effect: The All-Type RES PEN for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>. After an Ultimate is used, for every enemy target that is hit by this Ultimate, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt will additionally increase by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>. This effect lasts until the next time an Ultimate is used.
615832.AbridgedEffect: Increases the All-Type RES PEN for characters' Ultimate DMG. The more enemy targets the Ultimate attacks, the greater the increase in the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG, lasting until the next time the Ultimate is used.

For each enemy target hit by the Ultimate that achieves the highest number of enemy hits in a single attack in this battle, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt additionally increases by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>.
615832.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases the All-Type RES PEN for characters' Ultimate DMG. In this battle, the bigger the maximum number of enemy targets an Ultimate hits in a single attack, the greater the increase in the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG.

615840.Name: Attachment: Vestibular System

615840.EnhancedEffect: When characters use Ultimates via <u>Brain in a Vat</u>, their CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>90%</color>. This CRIT DMG increase lasts until the next attack ends.

615841.Name: Implant: Explicit Memory
615841.Effect: After characters use their Ultimate via <u>Brain in a Vat</u>, they gain a Shield equal in strength to <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turns.
615841.AbridgedEffect: Gains Shield when using an Ultimate via the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>.
615841.EnhancedEffect: After characters use their Ultimate via <u>Brain in a Vat</u>, they gain a Shield equal in strength to <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turns.
615841.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Gains Shield when using an Ultimate via the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>.

615842.Name: Mimesis: Tactile Pathway

615842.EnhancedEffect: After characters use an attack, they deal Additional DMG to the attacked enemy target(s). For every enemy target that was attacked, increase Additional DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of the character's ATK. Up to 5 enemies that have been defeated in the current battle will also be regarded as having been attacked.

615843.Effect: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, lasting until the end of the first Ultimate they use in battle. Upon entering battle, characters regenerate energy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of their respective Max Energy.
615843.AbridgedEffect: Increases the first instance of Ultimate DMG dealt by the character. Regenerates Energy upon entering battle.
615843.EnhancedEffect: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. Upon entering battle, regenerates energy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the character's Max Energy.
615843.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases Ultimate DMG dealt by characters. Regenerates Energy upon entering battle.

615844.Name: Load: Striated Cortex

615844.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: If characters' <u>AoE</u> ability only attacks one enemy, the ability deals a set amount of extra DMG based on the original ability DMG.

615845.EnhancedEffect: When characters use their Ultimate to attack enemies that are Weakness Broken, delay the enemy's action by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color>. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> times.
615845.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Ultimate attacks delay all Weakness Broken enemies' actions.

615846.Name: Coordination: Resonance Nucleus

615857.Effect: When struck with a killing blow, characters will not be knocked down and will instead consume all their Energy, then restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of the consumed Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per battle for the whole team.

616120.Name: Time's Miracle
616120.Effect: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Remembrance, dealing Ice DMG to all enemy targets with a high chance of Freezing them for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). 616940.EnhancedEffect: After an enemy target with "<u>Harmonize</u>" is defeated, causes <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> random adjacent targets to gain that enemy target's "<u>Harmonize</u>" stacks.
616940.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When any enemy target with "<u>Harmonize</u>" is defeated, applies "<u>Harmonize</u>" on a random adjacent target.

616941.Name: Goblet of Dionysus

616941.EnhancedEffect: Increases ally targets' Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color>. After attacking any Weakness Broken enemy targets, inflicts <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of "<u>Harmonize</u>."
616941.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases Break Effect. After attacking Weakness Broken enemy targets, inflicts "<u>Harmonize</u>" on them.

616942.Name: Coronal Pulse

616942.EnhancedEffect: For each stack of "<u>Harmonize</u>" an enemy target has, increases their Break DMG taken by <color=#f29e38ff>1.5%</color>.
616942.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Enemy targets with more "<u>Harmonize</u>" take more Break DMG.

616943.Name: String Quartet

616943.AbridgedEffect: Count additional stacks when "<u>Harmonize</u>" DMG is triggered. Increases maximum "<u>Harmonize</u>" stacks.
616943.EnhancedEffect: When "<u>Harmonize</u>" DMG is triggered, additionally count <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> stack(s). Increases maximum "<u>Harmonize</u>" stacks by <color=#f29e38ff>10</color>.
616943.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Count additional stacks when "<u>Harmonize</u>" DMG is triggered. Increases maximum "<u>Harmonize</u>" stacks.

616944.Name: Iambic Pentameter

616944.EnhancedEffect: Increases the DMG multiplier of "<u>Harmonize</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color> of the original multiplier.

616945.Name: Basso Continuo

616945.AbridgedEffect: After attacking Weakness Broken enemy targets, deal <u>Super Break DMG</u>.
616945.EnhancedEffect: After an ally target attacks a Weakness Broken enemy target, converts the Toughness Reduction of this attack into 1 instance of <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color> <u>Super Break DMG</u>.
616945.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After attacking Weakness Broken enemy targets, deal <u>Super Break DMG</u>.

616946.Name: Righteous Nome
616946.Effect: When an ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> base chance to inflict Freeze on the attacked target, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).

616946.EnhancedEffect: When an ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> base chance to inflict Freeze on the attacked target, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
616946.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After Breaking enemy targets' Weakness, there is a chance to Freeze them.

616950.Name: Stagnant Weave

616950.AbridgedEffect: After Breaking enemy targets' Weakness, delay their action.
616950.EnhancedEffect: When any ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, delays the enemy target's action by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
616950.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After Breaking enemy targets' Weakness, delay their action.

616951.Name: Original Declaration
616951.Effect: Increases ally targets' Break DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color>.
616951.EnhancedEffect: Increases ally targets' Break DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>.

616952.Name: Serene Storm

616952.EnhancedEffect: Increases ally targets' Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>.

616953.Name: Linear Melody
616953.Effect: When any ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, increases the attacker's SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s).
616953.AbridgedEffect: After inflicting Weakness Break on an enemy target, increases SPD.
616953.EnhancedEffect: When any ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, increases the attacker's SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>18%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s).
616953.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After inflicting Weakness Break on an enemy target, increases SPD.

616954.Name: Cross Rhythm

616954.AbridgedEffect: After inflicting Weakness Break on an enemy target, increases all allies' Break Effect.
616954.EnhancedEffect: When any ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, increases all ally targets' Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s).
616954.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After inflicting Weakness Break on an enemy target, increases all allies' Break Effect.

616955.Name: Free Tonality

616955.EnhancedEffect: Increases Break DMG taken by enemy targets by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color>.
616955.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases enemy targets' Break DMG taken.

616956.Name: Duke of Omens

616956.AbridgedEffect: Decreases Weakness Broken enemy targets' DEF.
616956.EnhancedEffect: Decreases DEF of Weakness Broken enemy targets by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>.
616956.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Decreases Weakness Broken enemy targets' DEF.

616957.Name: Novel Motif

616957.EnhancedEffect: When ally targets Break any enemy target's Weakness, the attacker restores HP by <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color> of their Max HP.
616957.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Restores HP after Breaking enemy targets' Weakness.

634000.Effect: When entering the Day, ally target's restores HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of their own Max HP. When ally target's turn starts during the Day, they restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of their own Max HP. During the Night, increases all allies' Max HP by <color=#f29e38ff>0%</color>, final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>, and all enemies' final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color>.
634000.AbridgedEffect: Allies restore HP when entering or during the Day. During the Night, increases both allies and enemies' DMG dealt and increases allies' Max HP.

634010.Name: Dreamlike Goldweaver

634011.Name: Flawless Finery
