634011.AbridgedEffect: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective at Night and will not be reset.

634012.Name: Rondo Finery

634013.Name: Bloodstained Finery

634016.Name: Weave Threads of Romance

634017.Name: Weave Threads of Beauty
634017.Effect: After activating the effect, each time an ally target uses an attack during the Day, additionally increases their SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color>. This can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> each Day/Night. Resets when Day/Night changes.
634017.AbridgedEffect: After activating the effect, each attack during the Day additionally increases the attacker's SPD. Resets when Day/Night changes.

634018.Name: Weave Threads of Fate

634018.AbridgedEffect: After activating the effect, the faster the SPD, the higher the final DMG dealt.

634020.Name: Connected Infinite Gates

634021.Name: A Fairytale About Dawn

634022.Name: A Fairytale About The Past

634022.AbridgedEffect: During the Day, ally targets regenerate Energy when they defeat any enemy targets.

634023.Name: A Fairytale About Us

634023.AbridgedEffect: This Boon and its enhancements also take effect at Night and will not be reset. When Night descends during Evernight, activates all allies' Ultimates.

634026.Name: A Prophecy Bringing Strife

634027.Name: A Prophecy Leaving Hope

634027.AbridgedEffect: During the Day, every enemy target hit by a target restores the attacker's HP at the start of the next turn.

634028.Name: A Prophecy Continuing Myths

634028.AbridgedEffect: During the Day, the more times Ultimates are used, the higher the final DMG dealt. Resets when the Day/Night changes.

634030.Name: Meeting Death's Palm

634031.Name: Fated to Decay

634031.AbridgedEffect: Extends the Night. After HP is reduced, additionally increases final DMG.

634032.Name: Fated to Wither

634032.AbridgedEffect: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective during the Day and will not be reset.

634033.AbridgedEffect: During the Night, restoring HP is also considered as HP reduction.

634036.Name: Blooms Before Unnamed Graves

634036.AbridgedEffect: Extends the Night. During the Night, additionally increases Max HP.

634037.Name: New Sprout on Dead Branch

634037.AbridgedEffect: During the Night, the more HP reduced, the greater the increase in Max HP. Resets when the Day/Night changes.

634038.Name: Butterflies on the Returning Road
634038.Effect: Each time an ally target's HP is reduced, increases their final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color>. Triggers up to 1 time in a single action. This can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> each Day/Night. Resets when Day/Night changes.
634038.AbridgedEffect: During the Night and after each time HP is reduced, increases final DMG dealt. Triggers up to 1 time during a single action. Resets when the Day/Night changes.

634040.Name: Crowned in Blood

Increases final DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> during the Night. Resets when Day/Night changes.
634040.AbridgedEffect: During the Night, this effect is activated after one ally target's HP is reduced by a certain percentage: Continuously restores HP and increases final DMG dealt. Resets when the Day/Night changes.

634041.Name: Lance of Divine Fury
634041.Effect: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective during the Day and will not be reset.
634041.AbridgedEffect: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective during the Day and will not be reset.

634042.Name: Blade of Human Rage
634042.Effect: Increases the HP percentage reduction required to activate the effect by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>. After activating effect, additionally increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> during the Night.

634043.Name: Shield of Triumphant Return

When activating the effect, the entire team restores HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of their Max HP, and the next <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> attack(s) additionally restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of their Max HP.
634043.AbridgedEffect: Decreases the HP reduction percentage required to activate this effect. Upon activation, restores all allies' HP, and the next <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> attacks also additionally restore HP.

634046.Name: Slay the Thousand Foes
634046.Effect: Increases the Night ratio by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>. After activating effect, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt during the Night by an additional <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>.
634046.AbridgedEffect: Extends Night. After activating this effect, additionally increases final DMG dealt.

634047.Name: Slay the Honorless Tyrant
634047.Effect: After activating the effect, for every 10% HP reduced, increases the HP restored by <color=#f29e38ff>1.0%</color> and final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>1.0%</color> during the Night. A maximum increase of <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> HP restoration and <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> final DMG can be gained in each Day/Night. Resets when Day/Night changes.
634047.AbridgedEffect: After activating this effect, the more HP reduced, the greater the HP restored/final DMG dealt. Resets when the Day/Night changes.

634048.Name: Slay the Maddened God

634050.Name: Endless Feasting
634050.Effect: During the Day, increases enemy targets' final DMG taken by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> and inflicts enemy targets with "Swan Song": At the start of each turn, take Physical Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>400%</color> <u>base DMG</u>.
634050.AbridgedEffect: During the Day, increases final DMG taken by enemy targets. Enemy targets are afflicted by "Swan Song": Take DMG at the start of each turn.

634051.Name: Unending Carnival

634051.AbridgedEffect: Extends the Day. During the Day, increases final DMG taken by enemies.

634052.Name: Unwaking Slumber

634052.AbridgedEffect: During the Day and after any enemy is attacked, triggers "Swan Song" DMG 1 time at a certain ratio.

634053.Name: Unceasing Poems

634053.AbridgedEffect: "Swan Song" is considered as "Bleed." Increases the DMG multiplier of "Swan Song" and deals DoT at the beginning of each turn.

634056.Name: The Besotted's Elegy

634056.AbridgedEffect: Extends the Day. During the Day, increases final DMG taken by enemies.

634057.Effect: Each time "Swan Song" deals DMG during the Day, increases its DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of the original multiplier. This can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color> each Day/Night. Resets when Day/Night changes.
634057.AbridgedEffect: During the Day, the more instances of DMG dealt by "Swan Song," the higher its multiplier will increase. Resets when the Day/Night changes.

634058.Name: The Lost's Elegy
634058.Effect: Each time other DoTs are received, triggers 1 instance of "Swan Song" DMG at a ratio of <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. This triggers up to <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> time(s) in each action.
634058.AbridgedEffect: "Swan Song" DMG is triggered at a certain ratio when taking other DoT DMG.

634060.Name: Phantom Strider
634060.Effect: When Elite Enemies are defeated in battle, earns <color=#f29e38ff>50</color> additional Cosmic Fragments. This effect triggers up to 1 time every battle. During the Night, increases final DMG dealt to Elite Enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> and reduces DMG taken from Elite Enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color>.
634060.AbridgedEffect: When Elite enemies are defeated in battle, gain additional Cosmic Fragments. This effect triggers up to 1 time every battle. At Night, increases final DMG dealt to Elite enemies and reduces DMG taken from Elite enemies.

634061.Name: Unblinking in Lies
634061.Effect: Increases Night ratio by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>. During the Night, increases additional Cosmic Fragments earned by <color=#f29e38ff>35</color> when Elite Enemies are defeated. The effect disappears during the first Day-Night change.
634061.AbridgedEffect: Extends the Night. During the Night, increases Cosmic Fragment gained when Elite Enemies are defeated. This effect expires after the first Day/Night change.

634062.Name: Unflinching in Tricks

634062.AbridgedEffect: When entering battle, if you possess more than <color=#f29e38ff>500</color> Cosmic Fragments, additionally increases final DMG dealt to Elite enemies during the Night.

634063.Name: Perfect in Fraud

634063.AbridgedEffect: In Basic Effect, increases the number of times you can gain additional Cosmic Fragments when Elite Enemies are defeated.

634066.Name: Long Night Blesses Thieves

634066.AbridgedEffect: Extends the Night. During the Night, additionally increases final DMG dealt to Elite enemies.

634067.Name: Sealed Vault Welcomes Traitors

634067.AbridgedEffect: In Basic Effect, increases Cosmic Fragments gained when Elite Enemies are defeated.

634068.Name: Even Lies Require Skill

634068.AbridgedEffect: For every time this Boon's effect of earning Cosmic Fragments is triggered in the current Divergent Universe run, deals Additional DMG to the attacked target after using an attack during the Night.

634070.Name: Worldbearing Sword

634070.AbridgedEffect: When entering the Day, the first character in the current team receives "Dawn," which increases their final DMG for a certain number of turns.

634071.Name: Departure of the Sinless

634071.AbridgedEffect: The switch interval between Day and Night decreases. When entering the Day, final DMG dealt increases.

634072.Name: Suffering of the Lost

634072.AbridgedEffect: The final DMG provided by "Dawn" decreases, but no longer lasts for a limited number of turns. It will lose its effect when the Day/Night changes.

634073.Name: Summon of the Pathfinder

634073.AbridgedEffect: Increases CRIT DMG dealt by characters with "Dawn."

634076.Name: Trial of the Worldbearer

634076.AbridgedEffect: The switch interval between Day and Night decreases. When entering the Day, final DMG dealt increases.

634077.Name: Transcendence of the Worldbearer

634077.AbridgedEffect: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective at Night and when entering Night, and will not be reset.

634078.Name: Return of the Worldbearer
634078.Effect: Every time the team enters the Day, final DMG dealt by ally targets increases by <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color>. This is stackable.
634078.AbridgedEffect: Every time the team enters the Day, increases final DMG dealt. This is stackable.

634080.Name: Whispers of the Rainbow
634080.Effect: During the Day, after an ally target restores HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60</color> times their level, increases their final DMG dealt during the Day by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color>. This is stackable up to <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> in a single Day/Night.
634080.AbridgedEffect: During the Day, final DMG dealt increases every time a certain amount of HP is restored. This is stackable.

634081.Name: O Rain, Hydrate All
634081.Effect: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>, up to a max reduction of <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When entering the Day, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
634081.AbridgedEffect: The switch interval between Day and Night decreases. When entering the Day, final DMG dealt increases.

634082.Name: O Wind, Caress the Woods
634082.Effect: The amount of restored HP needed in the base effect decreases to <color=#f29e38ff>30</color> time(s) of this unit level. After each time the base effect is triggered and final DMG is successfully increased, Max HP increases by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>.
634082.AbridgedEffect: Decreases the amount of restored HP required for the base effect. Increases Max HP each time the base effect is triggered.

634083.Name: O Light, Illuminate the Pure Land
634083.Effect: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective at Night and when entering Night, and can continue to stack and reset the max stack limit.
634083.AbridgedEffect: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective at Night and when entering Night, and can continue to stack.

634086.Name: O Lightning, Pierce the Skies
634086.Effect: Increases the Day ratio by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>. During the Day, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>.
634086.AbridgedEffect: Extends the Day. Increases final DMG dealt during the Day.

634087.Name: O Rainbow, Connect the Ends
634087.Effect: The max final DMG increase in a Day period in the base effect becomes <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color>.
634087.AbridgedEffect: Increases the base effect's final DMG boost limit in each Day.

634088.Name: O Sky, Gaze Upon Lives
634088.Effect: When entering the day and after the next time an ally target uses an attack, deals Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>1000%</color> of the target's Max HP to the attacked target.
634088.AbridgedEffect: When entering the Day, ally target's next attack deals Additional DMG.

634090.Name: Factors Elucidation
634090.Effect: Immediately obtain 1 destructible Curio. Whenever a Curio is damaged or discarded, immediately obtain <color=#f29e38ff>35</color> Cosmic Fragments. This can take effect up to <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s) per Domain. Increases final DMG dealt by ally targets by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> when entering the Day, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
634090.AbridgedEffect: Immediately obtain 1 destructible Curio. Whenever a Curio is damaged or discarded, immediately obtain Cosmic Fragments. Final DMG dealt by all allies increases when entering the Day.

634091.Name: Art of Cause and Effect
634091.Effect: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>, up to a max reduction of <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When entering the Day, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
634091.AbridgedEffect: The switch interval between Day and Night decreases. When entering the Day, final DMG dealt increases.

634092.Name: Art of Soul and Flesh
634092.Effect: The amount of Cosmic Fragments gained when a Curio is damaged or discarded becomes <color=#f29e38ff>45</color>. When entering Boss Domains, fix 1 random destroyed Curio of 1- to 3-star rarity.
634092.AbridgedEffect: The amount of Cosmic Fragments gained when a Curio is damaged or discarded increases. When entering Boss Domains, 1 random destroyed Curio of 1- to 3-star rarity is fixed.

634093.Name: Art of Reason and Madness
634093.Effect: Immediately discards <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> Negative Curio(s). If you possess <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> or fewer Negative Curio(s), the final DMG dealt by ally targets in the base effect additionally increases by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>.
634093.AbridgedEffect: Immediately discards <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> Negative Curio(s). If you possess <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> or fewer Negative Curio(s), additionally increases the final DMG dealt in the base effect.

634096.Name: Profound Comprehension
634096.Effect: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>, up to a max reduction of <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When entering the Day, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
634096.AbridgedEffect: The switch interval between Day and Night decreases. When entering the Day, final DMG dealt increases.

634097.Name: Introspective Clarity
634097.Effect: For every <color=#f29e38ff>100</color> Cosmic Fragments gained via this Golden Blood's Boon in this run of the Simulated Universe, ally targets' final DMG dealt in the base effect additionally increases by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>.
634097.AbridgedEffect: Whenever a certain amount of Cosmic Fragments is gained via this Golden Blood's Boon in this run of the Simulated Universe, additionally increases the final DMG dealt in the base effect.

634098.Name: Divine Dismantling
634098.Effect: After destroying or discarding <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> Curio(s) in total, immediately obtains 1 random destructible Curio of 1- to 2-star rarity. This effect can only be triggered <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) per Domain.
634098.AbridgedEffect: After destroying or discarding <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> Curio(s) in total, immediately obtains 1 random destructible Curio of 1- to 2-star rarity.

634100.Name: Gambit by the Flame
634100.Effect: When entering the Night, the first character in the current team gains <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of "Conquer." Characters with "Conquer" consume 1 stack of "Conquer" at the end of their turn/extra turn to advance their action by 100%/gain 1 extra turn and increase final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color>, lasting until the end of their next turn.
634100.AbridgedEffect: When entering the Night, the first character in the current team gains "Conquer." At the end of their turn/extra turn, consumes 1 stack of "Conquer" to advance their action by 100%/gain an extra turn, and to increase their final DMG dealt.

634101.Name: Sieging Pawn
634101.Effect: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>, up to a max reduction of <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When entering the Night, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
634101.AbridgedEffect: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night. When entering the Night, ally targets' final DMG dealt increases.

634102.Name: Double-Crossing Bishop
634102.Effect: After consuming "Conquer," SPD increases by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>. This effect loses effect when the Day/Night changes.
634102.AbridgedEffect: After consuming "Conquer," SPD increases. This effect loses its effect when the Day/Night changes.

634103.Name: Rampaging Knight
634103.Effect: Recover 5 Skill Points when entering the Night, and the first character in the current team additionally obtains <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of "Conquer."
634103.AbridgedEffect: Recover Skill Points when entering the Night, and the first character in the current team additionally obtains "Conquer."

634106.Name: Rule-Sundering King
634106.Effect: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>, up to a max reduction of <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When entering the Night, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
634106.AbridgedEffect: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night. When entering the Night, the final DMG dealt increases.

634107.Name: Arbitrating King
634107.Effect: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective during the Day and when entering the Day, and will not be reset.
634107.AbridgedEffect: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective during the Day and when entering the Day, and will not be reset.

634108.Name: Fire-Crowned King
634108.Effect: During the Night, the first character in the current team increases their final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> each time they take action, up to <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> within one Day/Night period. Resets when the Day/Night changes.
634108.AbridgedEffect: During the Night, the first character in the current team increases their final DMG dealt each time they take action. Resets when the Day/Night changes.

634110.Name: Dreams of Long Night
634110.Effect: For every ally target on the field during the Night, final DMG dealt increases by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>.
634110.AbridgedEffect: For every ally target on the field during the Night, the final DMG dealt increases.

634111.Name: Silence of Dawn Stars
634111.Effect: Increases the Night ratio by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>. During the Night, ally targets' final DMG dealt increases by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>.
634111.AbridgedEffect: Extends nighttime. While in Night, increases final DMG dealt.

634112.Name: Dwell of Night Breeze
634112.Effect: For every ally target on the field when entering the Night, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
634112.AbridgedEffect: When entering Night, final DMG dealt increases for every ally target on the field.

634113.Name: Weeping of Night Veil
634113.Effect: After an ally target uses an attack during the Night, deals extra Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>18%</color> of the combined Max HP value of all ally targets.
634113.AbridgedEffect: After attacking during the Night, deals extra Additional DMG based on the total combined Max HP value of the team.

634116.Name: Dream of Futuresight
634116.Effect: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>, up to a max reduction of <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When entering the Night, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
634116.AbridgedEffect: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night. When entering the Night, the final DMG dealt increases.

634117.Name: Dream of Retrosight
634117.Effect: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective during the Day and when entering the Day, and will not be reset.
634117.AbridgedEffect: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective during the Day and when entering the Day, and will not be reset.

634118.Name: Dream of Atonement
634118.Effect: When ally targets become departed/disappear/become downed during the Night, increases final DMG dealt by all ally targets by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color>, with a max stack of <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> in one Day/Night period. Resets when the Day/Night changes.
634118.AbridgedEffect: When ally targets become departed/disappear/downed during the Night, the final DMG dealt by all ally targets increases. This is reset when Day/Night changes.

634120.Name: Seismic Upheaval
634120.Effect: When entering the Night, all ally targets obtain a Shield equal to <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color> Max HP and obtain "Quartz." Ally targets with "Quartz" increases their final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When an ally target no longer has a Shield or when the battle enters the Day, remove "Quartz" from them.
634120.AbridgedEffect: When entering the Night, all ally targets obtain a Shield and "Quartz." Ally targets with "Quartz" and Shield have their final DMG dealt increased.

634121.Name: Bedrock Biter
634121.Effect: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>, up to a max reduction of <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When entering the Night, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
634121.AbridgedEffect: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night. When entering the Night, the final DMG dealt increases.

634122.Name: Kindling Igniter
634122.Effect: During the Night, after every <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s), ally targets obtain a Shield equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
634122.AbridgedEffect: Gains a Shield after a certain number of turns have passed during the Night.

634123.Name: Primeval Seer
634123.Effect: Every time an ally target obtains a Shield during the Night, increases their final DMG dealt during the Night by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>, stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> in a single Day/Night.
634123.AbridgedEffect: Every time a Shield is obtained during the Night, increases final DMG dealt during the Night. This effect is stackable.

634126.Name: Terrestrial Chaser
634126.Effect: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>, up to a max reduction of <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When entering the Night, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
634126.AbridgedEffect: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night. When entering the Night, the final DMG dealt increases.

634127.Name: Summit Ripper
634127.Effect: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective during the Day and when entering Day, and can continue to stack and reset the max stack limit.
634127.AbridgedEffect: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective during the Day and when entering the Day, and will not be reset.

634128.Name: Land Mender
634128.Effect: Additionally increase the final DMG dealt by ally targets with "Quartz" by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>.
634128.AbridgedEffect: The final DMG dealt by ally targets with "Quartz" additionally increases.

670010.Name: City Restorer
670010.Effect: Comet Nucleus appears in the Action Order: Each time it takes a turn, absorbs all allies' Shields, reducing their values to 1, and turning the absorbed values into its own Shield. Then, it deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>2500%</color> of its Shield value plus <color=#f29e38ff>1000%</color> <u>base DMG</u> to all enemies, with a <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> base chance to Freeze enemies for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). When characters take damage, Comet Nucleus's Shield will be consumed first. When <u>Quake</u> DMG is triggered, <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of Comet Nucleus's Shield will be considered as the character's Shield.
670010.AbridgedEffect: A Comet Nucleus appears in the Action Order to block DMG for the team. During its action, it absorbs Shields from allies to deal Physical DMG to all enemies, with a chance to Freeze them.

670060.Name: Heartless Giant
670060.Effect: "<u>Quake</u>" DMG is considered as Follow-up ATK DMG. After a character launches Follow-up ATKs, all allies gain 1 "Mechacore Component" stack, up to <color=#f29e38ff>77</color> stack(s). After a character with a Shield is attacked, consumes all of their "Mechacore Component" to deal <color=#f29e38ff>7</color> instances(s) of random-Type "<u>Quake</u>" DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>177%</color> of the current Shield Effect. Every stack consumed increases this DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>7%</color>.
670060.AbridgedEffect: "<u>Quake</u>" DMG is considered as Follow-up ATK DMG. After a character launches Follow-up ATKs, all allies gain the "Mechacore Component" state. After being attacked, consumes "Mechacore Component" to deal "<u>Quake</u>" DMG based on the amount consumed and the current Shield Effect.

670140.Name: Silent Hunter
670140.Effect: When enemy targets enter battle, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> base chance for them to be inflicted with <u>Dissociation</u> that lasts for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). Enemies in <u>Dissociation</u> will resist all DMG, and all CRIT DMG and Break DMG taken are tallied. When the effect is dispelled, additionally deals a set amount of CRIT DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> of the tallied value to all enemies. When the tallied value reaches <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of the target's Max HP, <u>Dissociation</u> will immediately be dispelled.
670140.AbridgedEffect: When enemies enter battle, they have a chance to become afflicted with the <u>Dissociation</u> state. Enemies under <u>Dissociation</u> will become resistant to all DMG, and CRIT DMG and Break DMG taken are tallied. When this state is dispelled, deal a set amount of CRIT DMG based on the tallied value to all enemies.

670150.Name: Mausoleum of Scars
670150.Effect: Oblivion appears in the Action Order: For every 10 actual Toughness Reduction dealt by an ally, the ally's action Advances Forward by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>. When Oblivion takes action, deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>2000%</color> <u>base DMG</u> and deals <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> Toughness Reduction to all enemies, with a <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> base chance to inflict the <u>Dissociation</u> state on the targets, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). The state increases DMG taken by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
670150.AbridgedEffect: Oblivion appears in the Action Order: The actual Toughness Reduction dealt by allies will cause the ally's action to be Advanced Forward. When taking action, deals Ice DMG and Toughness Reduction to all enemies with a chance of inflicting <u>Dissociation</u> and increasing the DMG taken.

670210.Name: Relative Tracer
670210.Effect: When an enemy target is afflicted with "<u>Suspicion</u>," Freeze, or DoT states, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> base chance of Blasting the state to adjacent targets. When there are no adjacent targets, the state is Blasted to the original target. Each state can only be Blasted by the same target once in a single action. When one enemy target has Blasted a total of <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> time(s) or is defeated, deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>1200%</color> <u>base DMG</u> to that target and adjacent targets, with a <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> base chance to inflict Frozen that lasts for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
670210.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy target is afflicted with "<u>Suspicion</u>," Freeze, or DoT states, there is a high chance of Blasting the state to adjacent targets. After Blasting multiple times, deals DMG to the target and adjacent targets, with a chance to inflict Frozen on them.

670280.Name: Self-Proof Institute
670280.Effect: After <u>Suspicion</u> reaches <color=#f29e38ff>99</color> stacks, it will be consumed and turned into 1 stack of Self-Negation: Increases DoT dealt by attackers to this unit by <color=#f29e38ff>70%</color>. Each stack additionally increases DoT dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color>, stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff>50</color> time(s). At the start of an enemy's turn, they take Lightning DoT equal to <color=#f29e38ff>135%</color> of <u>base DMG</u> and cause adjacent targets to take Lightning DoT equal to <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of the original DMG multiplier. At <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> or more stacks: At the start of the turn, regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of <u>Brain in a Vat</u> for a random character. At <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> or more stacks: At the start of the turn, regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of <u>Brain in a Vat</u> for all allies.
670280.AbridgedEffect: When <u>Suspicion</u> reaches a certain number of stacks, it automatically becomes Self-Negation. On the basis of the Self-Negation stacks, increases the DoT dealt by the character, and recovers <u>Brain in a Vat</u> for the character and adjacent allied units based on the DMG they dealt at the start of the turn.

670320.Name: Herb Plucker
670320.Effect: Inflicts "Panacea" on enemy targets when they enter battle: When "<u>Dewdrop</u>" breaks, charges the attacked target's "Panacea" by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of the Dewdrop's charge, up to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the sum of all characters' Max HP. At the start of the enemy target's turn, consumes the Charge value, deals Wind DoT equal to <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color> <u>base DMG</u>, and restores all allies' HP by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of Max HP. For every Charge value that equals 1% of the sum of all characters' Max HP, increases this DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color> and increases the HP restored by <color=#f29e38ff>4%</color>.
670320.AbridgedEffect: When enemy targets enter battle, they receive "Panacea," which Charges when Dewdrop is broken. At the start of the enemy target's turn, deals DoT based on Charge percentage and restores HP to all allies.

670350.Name: Borisin
670350.Effect: "Flower of Annihilation" appears in the Action Order. When "<u>Dewdrop</u>" breaks, it will Charge Flower of Annihilation by <color=#f29e38ff>600%</color> of the Dewdrop's charge. When "Flower of Annihilation" takes action, it deals Charge value plus <color=#f29e38ff>1200%</color> of <u>base DMG</u> Fire DMG to all enemies. Every stack of "<u>Grit</u>" held by the team will additionally increase the DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>1.5%</color>.
670350.AbridgedEffect: A "Flower of Annihilation" appears in the Action Order. During its action, it deals DMG to all enemies. This DMG is affected by the characters' "<u>Dewdrop</u>" charge and "<u>Grit</u>" stacks.

670430.Name: Bionic Messiah
670430.Effect: When no enemy target has Fiber, Fiber will be applied to random attacked targets after characters use an attack. After targets with Fiber receive a total of <color=#f29e38ff>8</color> attacks or are defeated, the target receives Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>4500%</color> <u>base DMG</u>, adjacent targets receive DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>3000%</color> <u>base DMG</u>, and all allies' Max HP increases by <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s). If only 1 enemy target is attacked, then <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> attacks are considered to have been launched.
670430.AbridgedEffect: After characters attack, random attacked targets gain Fiber. When targets with Fiber are cumulatively attacked multiple times or defeated, deals Lightning DMG to it and units adjacent to it, and increases all ally units' Max HP.

670470.Name: Molten Knight
670470.Effect: Every time the team obtains <color=#f29e38ff>9</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u> or defeats the enemy target, fires <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> Lux Arrow(s) to strike random targets. Each Lux Arrow deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>400%</color> <u>base DMG</u> and applies <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> <u>Spore</u> to the attacked target, while also dealing 1 hit of <u>Spore</u> burst DMG. During this time, max <u>Spore</u> stacks will become <color=#f29e38ff>99</color>.
670470.AbridgedEffect: After the team obtains a certain number of <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks or defeats the enemy target, fires Lux Arrows to strike random targets and applies <u>Spore</u> to the attacked target while also dealing <u>Spore</u> Shatter DMG.

670500.Name: Voyage Monitor
670500.Effect: After a character deals Break DMG, deal a set amount of Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the original damage after the attack. When a character's <u>Grit</u> is higher than <color=#f29e38ff>30</color> stack(s), they gain a Shield equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s). Also, deal DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>1200%</color> <u>base DMG</u> and <color=#f29e38ff>15</color> Toughness-Reduction to all enemies, and consume <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> stack(s) of <u>Grit</u>.
670500.AbridgedEffect: After a character deals Break DMG, deal DMG for 1 extra time. When a character's <u>Grit</u> is higher than a certain number of stacks, obtains a Shield. Then, deals DMG to all enemies by consuming <u>Grit</u>.

670580.Name: Annihilation Scholar
670580.Effect: After characters are attacked, receives <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> Annihilation Form(s). After launching a Counter, receives <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> Annihilation Form(s). When a character possesses <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> Annihilation Form(s), removes all Annihilation Forms from them and increases their Ultimate DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s), as well as dealing Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>650%</color> of the character's ATK to all enemies. This DMG is considered as Ultimate DMG.
670580.AbridgedEffect: After characters are attacked or have launched a Counter, they receive Annihilation Form(s). When characters possess <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> Annihilation Form(s), removes all Annihilation Forms and increases the DMG dealt by Ultimate, as well as dealing Ultimate DMG to all enemies.

670630.Name: Advisor Physician
670630.Effect: DMG dealt by "<u>Dewdrop</u>" is considered as Follow-up ATK DMG. After "<u>Dewdrop</u>" burst as a result of the character launching a Follow-up ATK or using an attack, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color> fixed chance every time for them to trigger the following effect: Charge "<u>Dewdrop</u>" for <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of its maximum, and deals DMG equal to 1/2/3/4 time(s) of "<u>Dewdrop</u>'s" Charge with a <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color>/<color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>/<color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>/<color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> fixed chance.
670630.AbridgedEffect: DMG from "<u>Dewdrop</u>" is considered as Follow-up ATK DMG. Triggering Follow-up ATKs or shattering "<u>Dewdrops</u>" has a chance to charge "<u>Dewdrop</u>" and additionally deal multiplied DMG.

670640.Name: Phantom Thief
670640.Effect: Calling Card appears in the Action Order: After characters launch a Follow-up ATK, their action advances by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color>. When taking action, advances the action of the first character in the lineup by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. After this character uses an attack, deals <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> instance(s) of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> of the character's ATK, taking effect over a max of <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> attacks. Allies' <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG multiplier increases by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the original multiplier, and a countdown with <color=#f29e38ff>100</color> SPD appears in the Action Order. The effects last until the countdown's turn begins.
670640.AbridgedEffect: Calling Card appears in the Action Order: After a character triggers a Follow-up ATK, Advance their action Forward. When taking action, Advances Forward the action of the first character in the team lineup. After that character uses an attack, deals multiple instances of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG and increases <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG dealt by all allies.

670700.Name: Star-Molding Worm
670700.Effect: Basic ATK and Skill DMG taken by enemy targets increase by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. "Hivespawn" appears in the Action Order: when ally targets gain or consume Skill Points, "Hivespawn" gains 1 Hits Per Action for the next attack. At the start of the turn, "Hivespawn" deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>500%</color> <u>base DMG</u> to one random enemy for each Hit Per Action, and grants a Shield equal to <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color> of respective Max HP for all allies. "Hivespawn"'s Hits Per Action will not be less than <color=#f29e38ff>10</color>.
670700.AbridgedEffect: Basic ATK and Skill DMG taken by enemy targets Increase. A "Hivespawn" countdown appears in the Action Order. Using an attack, consuming Skill Points, or recovering Skill Points at the start of the turn will increase its Hits Per Action. After attacking, provides a Shield to all allies based on Hits Per Action.

670720.Name: Child of Calamity
670720.Effect: Enemy target obtains "Borehole" when entering battle: "Borehole" will record all "<u>Spores</u>" numbers accumulated by the holder. After accumulating <color=#f29e38ff>18</color> "Spores," deals Quantum DMG to all enemies equal to <color=#f29e38ff>2200%</color> of <u>base DMG</u>. For every debuff the enemy has, this DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color>, up to a max increase of <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. Then, the accumulated spore count is cleared.
670720.AbridgedEffect: Enemy target obtains Borehole when entering battle: Borehole will record all <u>Spores</u> accumulated by the holder and deals Quantum DMG to all enemies. The more debuffs active, the higher the DMG.

670860.Name: Useless Scholar
670860.Effect: After the team uses a total of <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> Ultimate(s) while not under the Overclock effect, gains Overclock: After attacking with an Ultimate, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the attacker's ATK <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s). After using an Ultimate, this status will end. The first character in the team lineup activates their Ultimate, Charges <u>Brain in a Vat</u> to <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color>, and uses Ultimate <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> times before the status ends on them.
670860.AbridgedEffect: Enters the Overclock state after all allies have used their Ultimates many times. While in this state, using Ultimates to attack will deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG, and the first character in the lineup will Charge <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color> upon using their Ultimate.

670870.Name: Aggregator
670870.Effect: After allies use their Ultimates a total of <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> times, deals <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> instances of Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>400%</color> of <u>base DMG</u> to a random enemy and applies <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> <u>Spore(s)</u> to it. This DMG will deal DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of the original DMG to adjacent enemies. Every time this effect is triggered, increases the number of instances in this battle by 1 and increases the Ultimate DMG dealt by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>7%</color>, to a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> times.
670870.AbridgedEffect: After a total of <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> Ultimates are used across all allies, deals multiple instances of Wind DMG and apply <u>Spores</u> to a random enemy target and their adjacent units. Each time this effect is triggered, the number of instances for this DMG increases by 1 in this battle and increases the Ultimate DMG dealt by the characters.

671020.Name: The Pathless
671020.Effect: When the character deals <u>Quake</u> DMG, every type of DoT effect active on the enemy target will increase the current <u>Quake</u> DMG multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of the original multiplier.
671020.AbridgedEffect: The more types of DoTs the enemy has, the higher the <u>Quake</u> DMG dealt to them by characters.

671030.Name: Ecological Administrator
671030.Effect: When characters deal <u>Quake</u> DMG, every character at Max HP will increase the current <u>Quake</u> DMG multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> of the original multiplier.
671030.AbridgedEffect: The more characters who have full HP, the higher the <u>Quake</u> DMG the characters deal.

671060.Name: Sentimental Guardian
671060.Effect: The Follow-up ATK DMG taken by enemy target increases by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>. After the character defeats the enemy target, all allies will nullify all DMG received except for DoT. This effect is removed after allies are attacked, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
671060.AbridgedEffect: The Follow-up ATK DMG taken by enemy target increases. After the character defeats the enemy target, all allies will nullify all DMG received except for DoT. This effect is removed after allies are attacked.

671080.Name: Civilization Correspondent
671080.Effect: When characters use their Ultimate, they gain a Shield that can offset DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s). After dealing Ultimate DMG with an attack, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>600%</color> of the character's current Shield Effect to the attacked targets.
671080.AbridgedEffect: When characters use their Ultimate, they gain a Shield. Characters' Ultimate attacks will deal <u>Quake</u> DMG to the attacked targets based on the current total Shield Effect on the character.

671120.Name: Bookwriter
671120.Effect: When enemy targets are Frozen, inflicts <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> stack(s) of "<u>Suspicion</u>." After suffering DoT, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> base chance the target will enter the Frozen state for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). Every enemy target can only enter the Frozen state through this method 1 time every <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
671120.AbridgedEffect: When enemy targets are Frozen, apply "<u>Suspicion</u>" on them. DoT has a chance to inflict Freeze on enemy targets.

671130.Name: Memory Doctor
671130.Effect: "<u>Dewdrop</u>'s" Charging Efficiency increases by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. After a character launches an attack, "<u>Dewdrop</u>" will additionally deal "<u>Dewdrop</u>" DMG 1 time equal to <color=#f29e38ff>250%</color> of the original "<u>Dewdrop</u>" DMG multiplier to all Frozen enemy targets.
671130.AbridgedEffect: "<u>Dewdrop</u>"'s Charging Efficiency increases. After a character launches an attack, "<u>Dewdrop</u>" will additionally deal DMG 1 time to all Frozen enemy targets.

671170.Name: Wandering Meme
671170.Effect: Increases characters' Basic ATK DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color>. When using Basic ATK to launch an attack, enemies in the Weakness Broken state will be considered Frozen.
671170.AbridgedEffect: Characters' Basic ATK DMG dealt increases. When using a Basic ATK to attack, Weakness Broken enemies will be considered as being Frozen.

671180.Name: Astral Computer
671180.Effect: When an enemy target leaves the Frozen state, all allies regenerate <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> Energy. When enemies' <u>Dissociation</u> state is dispelled, allies additionally regenerate <color=#f29e38ff>8</color> Energy.
671180.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy target leaves the Frozen state, all allies regenerate Energy. After enemies leave <u>Dissociation</u>, allies additionally regenerate Energy.

671210.Name: Sizzling Thunder
671210.Effect: When an enemy target becomes Frozen, causes all currently active DoT on the target to immediately deal DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>180%</color> of the original DMG. Each active DoT will apply 1 stack of <u>Suspicion</u>.
671210.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy target becomes Frozen, immediately triggers DoTs 1 time. Each DoT active on it will apply 1 stack of <u>Suspicion</u>.

671230.Name: Death Denier
671230.Effect: Increases characters' DoT dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>160%</color>. After applying a debuff on enemy targets, increases the character's Max HP by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color> to a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> stack(s), lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
671230.AbridgedEffect: Increases characters' DoT dealt. After a character inflicts a debuff on an enemy target, the character's Max HP increases.

671240.Name: Executor of Vengeance
671240.Effect: After a character uses an attack, inflicts <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> stack(s) of "<u>Suspicion</u>" on the attacked target. Increases Vulnerability provided by "<u>Suspicion</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>. When characters hit enemy targets afflicted with "<u>Suspicion</u>," increase CRIT DMG dealt based on <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of the Vulnerability provided by "<u>Suspicion</u>."
671240.AbridgedEffect: After a character uses an attack, inflicts "<u>Suspicion</u>" to the attacked target. Vulnerability provided by "<u>Suspicion</u>" increases, and CRIT DMG dealt by characters increases based on its stack.

671260.Name: Jester of Anatta
671260.Effect: When a character launches a Follow-up ATK, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> base chance to apply 1 random debuff on the attacked target, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s). The random debuffs include: Decrease DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>15.0%</color>, decrease DEF by <color=#f29e38ff>30.0%</color>, and decrease SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>20.0%</color>.
671260.AbridgedEffect: After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, there is a high chance to inflict a random debuff to the target.

671340.Name: Eternal Stranger
671340.Effect: When "<u>Dewdrop</u>" Charges, for every 1% of CRIT Rate the character has, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color> fixed chance to increase the Charge value. The increased ratio equals to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of the character's CRIT DMG.
671340.AbridgedEffect: When "<u>Dewdrop</u>" is charging, the charge value has a chance to CRIT.

671350.Name: Pyromancer
671350.Effect: Characters' Max HP increases by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. For every <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> of actual Toughness Reduction dealt, Charges all allies' "<u>Dewdrop</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>. When attacking Weakness Broken enemy targets, charges all allies' "<u>Dewdrop</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>6%</color>.
671350.AbridgedEffect: Characters' Max HP increases. When dealing actual Toughness Reduction or when attacking Weakness Broken enemy targets, charges all allies' "<u>Dewdrop</u>."

671360.Name: Graveward Lunatic
671360.Effect: The characters' Max HP increases by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>. After restoring HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color> of Max HP, the DMG multiplier of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG dealt increases by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the original DMG multiplier.
671360.AbridgedEffect: The characters' Max HP increases. After restoring a certain amount of HP, <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG increases.

671370.Name: Viscorpus
671370.Effect: Increases the maximum limit of "<u>Dewdrop</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. When a character breaks "<u>Dewdrop</u>" by using their Basic ATK, restores <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> of this "<u>Dewdrop</u>'s" Charge.
671370.AbridgedEffect: Increases maximum limit of "<u>Dewdrop</u>." When a character breaks "<u>Dewdrop</u>" with their Basic ATK, restores part of "<u>Dewdrop</u>'s" Charge.

671400.Name: Disaster-Halting Mechanism
671400.Effect: After enemy targets use an attack to reduce characters' Shields, increases all allies' SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s), then gains <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
671400.AbridgedEffect: After enemy targets use an attack to reduce characters' Shields, increases all allies' SPD, then gains <u>Critical Boost</u>.

671410.Name: Fiction's Arbiter
671410.Effect: Increases DMG dealt in the next turn by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color> for each <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color> actual action advance effect the character receives, up to a max of <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> action advance. This effect is additionally increased against Frozen enemy targets by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>.
671410.AbridgedEffect: When an ally target is subjected to the actual advance action effect, their DMG dealt in the next turn increases. The effect additionally increases against Frozen enemy targets.

671450.Name: Court of Homogeneity
671450.Effect: When an enemy target attacks and if there are character(s) that have <u>Critical Boost</u>, increases the DMG taken by the enemy target by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s). Meanwhile, Action Advance characters with <u>Critical Boost</u>. Each stack of <u>Critical Boost</u> Action Advances the character by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color>.
671450.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy target attacks, if a character has <u>Critical Boost</u>, the enemy target takes increased DMG. Additionally, the action of the character with <u>Critical Boost</u> is Advanced Forward.

671460.Name: Bounty Hunter
671460.Effect: When a character's attack deals CRIT DMG, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>65%</color> fixed chance to additionally deal a set amount of CRIT DMG equal to 1‚Äì100% of the original DMG for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s). This is considered as Follow-up ATK DMG.
671460.AbridgedEffect: When a character deals CRIT DMG, there is a chance to additionally deal CRIT DMG equal to a certain proportion of the original DMG. This is considered as Follow-up ATK DMG.

671500.Name: Pre-Battle Caregiver
671500.Effect: Characters' Break Effect increases by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. When inflicting Weakness Break on an enemy with an attack, the attacking character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s), and then deals <u>Quake</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>1000%</color> of the current Shield Effect to the target after an attack.
671500.AbridgedEffect: Characters' Break Effect increases. After Breaking an enemy target's Weakness, the attacking character gains a Shield and deals <u>Quake</u> DMG based on the current Shield Effect on the target.

671510.Name: Memosnatcher
671510.Effect: When a character uses an attack that deals Ultimate DMG, consumes their HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of their current HP. After this attack, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> base chance to inflict Freeze on the attack target, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). Every stack of <u>Grit</u> increases the character's Effect Hit Rate by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color>.
671510.AbridgedEffect: Characters' Ultimates consume HP and have a chance to inflict Freeze on the target. The more the <u>Grit</u> stacks they have, the higher the characters' Effect Hit Rate.

671520.Name: Wastelander
671520.Effect: After a character attacks a Weakness Broken enemy, converts the Toughness Reduction of the attack into 1 instance of <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> <u>Super Break DMG</u>. After accumulating <color=#f29e38ff>30</color> stack(s) of <u>Grit</u>, additionally deals <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> <u>Super Break DMG</u> caused by this effect.
671520.AbridgedEffect: When characters attack a Weakness Broken enemy target, deals <u>Super Break DMG</u>. After accumulating a number of <u>Grit</u> stacks, this <u>Super Break DMG</u> increases.

671570.Name: Self-Betrayer
671570.Effect: When a character Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, recovers <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> Skill Point(s). Based on the total number of Grit stacks on all allies, for every <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> stack(s) of "<u>Grit</u>," increases all allies' Break DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color>.
671570.AbridgedEffect: When a character Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, recovers Skill Points. The higher the team "<u>Grit</u>" stacks, the higher the Break DMG dealt by characters.

671610.Name: Reminiscence Artist
671610.Effect: <u>Aftertaste</u> has a <color=#f29e38ff>4%</color> base chance of causing enemy targets that are not Frozen to become Frozen, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). Each attack can cause this effect to be calculated for a max of <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s). Increases the DMG multiplier of <u>Aftertaste</u> against Frozen enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> of the original multiplier.
671610.AbridgedEffect: <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG has a chance of Freezing enemy targets. <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG multiplier increases against Frozen enemies.

671650.Name: Fireworks Master
671650.Effect: Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters increases by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, deals to the attacked enemy target 1 instance of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>500%</color> of the total HP the character lost plus the HP they restored. Then, clears the accumulated HP changes. HP change is accumulated up to <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color> of the character's Max HP.
671650.AbridgedEffect: Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters increase. After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, deals "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG based on the tallied HP they have lost and HP restored to self.

671670.Name: Aether Phantom
671670.Effect: Increases max <u>Spores</u> to <color=#f29e38ff>5</color>. After characters launch a Follow-up ATK, apply <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> <u>Spore(s)</u> to the target.
671670.AbridgedEffect: Increases max <u>Spores</u> limit. When a character launches a Follow-up ATK, apply <u>Spores</u> to the attacked target.

671680.Name: Maniacal Chess Player
671680.Effect: Increase CRIT DMG dealt by characters' Follow-up ATKs by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. When using "<u>Brain in a Vat</u>" to launch Ultimate and deal DMG to enemy targets, it is considered as a Follow-up ATK.
671680.AbridgedEffect: CRIT DMG dealt by characters' Follow-up ATKs increases. Ultimates used via "<u>Brain in a Vat</u>" is considered to be Follow-up ATKs.

671700.Name: Calamity Worker
671700.Effect: When a character gains a Shield, causes <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> random enemy target(s) to gain 1 <u>Spore</u>. <u>Spore's</u> DMG multiplier increases by <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color> of the original multiplier.
671700.AbridgedEffect: When a character gains a Shield, cause random enemy targets to gain <u>Spore</u>. <u>Spore</u>'s DMG increases.

671730.Name: Calamity Remnant
671730.Effect: Each time 1 Skill Point is consumed or overflowed, all allies gain 1 stack of "Honeydew," up to <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> stack(s). After a character uses an attack, they consume all their "Honeydew" stacks. For each stack consumed, deals Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> Max HP. This attack is considered as Basic ATK DMG.
671730.AbridgedEffect: Each time 1 Skill Point is consumed or overflowed, all allies additionally deal Basic ATK DMG in their next attack based on their Max HP.

671740.Name: Diabolical Worker
671740.Effect: After a character uses an attack, apply <u>Spores</u> to random enemy targets that were attacked. When allies take consecutive action for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> / <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> / <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> times or more, the added number of <u>Spores</u> becomes <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> / <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> / <color=#f29e38ff>6</color>.
671740.AbridgedEffect: After a character uses an attack, apply <u>Spores</u> to random enemy targets that were attacked. The more consecutive actions allies take, the more <u>Spores</u> will be applied.

671780.Name: Deceiver Worker
671780.Effect: Increases max <u>Spores</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>3</color>. After a character uses an attack that deals Ultimate DMG and if the attacked target's <u>Spore</u> bursts, then additionally deals Ultimate DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>250%</color> of the character's ATK to the target. Every <u>Spore</u> burst by this attack increases this DMG multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
671780.AbridgedEffect: Increases max <u>Spores</u> limit. After Characters' Ultimate causes <u>Spores</u> to burst, deals 1 instance of Ultimate DMG to the attacked target. Every <u>Spore</u> burst will increase the DMG.

671800.Name: Astral Ecology Care Worker
671800.Effect: Increases Ultimate DMG taken by enemy targets by <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color>. Charges "<u>Brain in a Vat</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color> when Shielded characters are attacked.
671800.AbridgedEffect: Increases Ultimate DMG taken by enemy targets. Charges "<u>Brain in a Vat</u>" when Shielded characters are attacked.

671820.Name: Block Builder
671820.Effect: After characters use an attack, every debuff active on the attacked targets increases the character's ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color> to a max of <color=#f29e38ff>99</color> stack(s). When the turn ends, lose <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> stacks of this ATK boost.
671820.AbridgedEffect: After characters use an attack, they receive 1 stack of ATK boost for every debuff on the attacked targets. When the turn ends, lose <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> stack(s) of ATK boost.

671840.Name: Silverheart Guards
671840.Effect: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, charges <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> and also regenerates Energy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of Max Energy. After defeating the target, regenerates Energy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of Max Energy.
671840.AbridgedEffect: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, charges <u>Brain in a Vat</u> and also regenerates Energy. After defeating the target, regenerates Energy.

671850.Name: Anti-Organic Liquidator
671850.Effect: When a character uses an Ultimate, consumes HP from all allies equal to <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of their current HP and increases their DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> to a max of <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> stack(s), lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
671850.AbridgedEffect: When a character uses their Ultimate, all allies consume HP and increase DMG dealt.

672010.Name: Architect Scribe
672010.Effect: If a character attacks and inflicts Freeze on an enemy target, then all allies gain a Shield equal to <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> of their respective Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s). Every enemy target Frozen during this attack will increase the obtained Shield Effect by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of their respective Max HP.
672010.AbridgedEffect: When a character attacks and inflicts Freeze on an enemy target, all allies will gain a Shield. Every target Frozen during this attack will increase the Shield Effect gained.

672020.Name: Tomb Keeper
672020.Effect: Characters' Effect RES increases by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> and "<u>Quake</u>" DMG dealt increases by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When resisting the inflicted debuffs, deals "<u>Quake</u>" DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>400%</color> of the current Shield Effect to the target. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy target.
672020.AbridgedEffect: Characters' Effect RES increases and "<u>Quake</u>" DMG dealt increases. When resisting debuffs inflicted on them, deals "<u>Quake</u>" DMG to the target.

672030.Name: Planetary Purifier
672030.Effect: Increases the Shield Effect gained by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>. After losing the Shield, restores HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> of their Max HP.
672030.AbridgedEffect: Increases shields received by characters. After they lose the Shield, they restore HP.

672050.Name: Unsinkable
672050.Effect: The Shield Effect a character receives increases by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>, for every 1% of HP that is different between the character's Max HP and current HP, the Shield Effect additionally increases by <color=#f29e38ff>0.8%</color>.
672050.AbridgedEffect: The Shield Effect received by the characters increases, the higher the difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, the higher the Shield Effect.

672060.Name: Dreamweaver
672060.Effect: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>360%</color> of the character's current Shield Effect to the attacked target(s).
672060.AbridgedEffect: After a character launches Follow-up ATK, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG based on the current Shield Effect.

672100.Name: Scholar of Candles
672100.Effect: Increases Character's CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When a character takes fatal DMG, their HP will become 1, and they will obtain a Shield equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of their Max HP before entering a Freeze state that cannot be dispelled, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). While in this state, their HP cannot be restored, and the team can trigger this effect <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s) at most. Before the triggers are completely consumed, increase characters' CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>.
672100.AbridgedEffect: Increases characters' CRIT DMG. When characters take fatal DMG, they will not be knocked down. Instead, they will gain a Shield and become Frozen. This can only take effect a certain number of times for the whole team.

672140.Name: Cognition Reviewer
672140.Effect: After characters attack a non-Elite enemy target with less than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> current HP percentage, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> base chance to inflict the <u>Dissociation</u> state on them, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s), and deals a set amount of CRIT DMG equal to their current HP.
672140.AbridgedEffect: After characters attack enemy targets with less than <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of current HP percentage, there is a chance of inflicting <u>Dissociation</u> on them and deals fatal damage to the target.

672150.Name: Purifier
672150.Effect: When enemy target's current HP is greater than <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of Max HP, their duration of being Frozen increases by 1 turn. DMG received by Frozen enemy targets increases by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
672150.AbridgedEffect: When enemy target's HP percentage is greater than <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>, their duration of being Frozen increases by 1 turn. DMG received by Frozen enemy targets increases.

672160.Name: Biographer
672160.Effect: After a character attacks a Frozen target, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG 1 time equal to <color=#f29e38ff>240%</color> of the character's ATK to the target.
672160.AbridgedEffect: After a character attacks a Frozen target, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG.

672180.Name: Armed Archaeologist Team
672180.Effect: After an enemy target becomes Frozen, increase the Ultimate DMG they receive by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>. This effect will last for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s) after Freeze is dispelled.
672180.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy target becomes Frozen, increases the Ultimate DMG they receive. This effect will endure for a number of turns even after they are no longer Frozen.

672200.Name: Night Watch
672200.Effect: When the enemy target enters battle, they are inflicted with the Bleed effect. While Bleeding, they will take Physical DoT equal to <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of their Max HP at the start of their turn. This DMG cannot exceed <color=#f29e38ff>650%</color> of all allies' total Shield Effect.
672200.AbridgedEffect: When enemy targets enter the battle, they are afflicted with Bleed. DMG dealt by Bleed is based on the total sum of Shield on all allies.

672230.Name: Doctors of Chaos
672230.Effect: Increases DoT dealt by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When enemy targets enter battle, they become afflicted with the "Observed" state and receive Fire DoT equal to <color=#f29e38ff>300%</color> of the total Max HP of all allies at the start of the turn.
672230.AbridgedEffect: DoT dealt by characters increases. When enemy targets enter battle, they become afflicted with the "Observed" state and receive Fire DoT based on the total Max HP of all allies at the start of the turn.

672240.Name: Sin Thirster
672240.Effect: Characters' DoT can cause CRIT Hit. When dealing DoT, CRIT DMG cannot exceed <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>.
672240.AbridgedEffect: Characters' DoT can CRIT Hit. CRIT DMG is capped.

672250.Name: Rescuer
672250.Effect: When enemy targets take Toughness-Reducing DMG during an attack, they have a <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> base chance of being afflicted with Burn and receiving Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>120%</color> <u>base DMG</u> at the start of their turn for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
672250.AbridgedEffect: Enemy targets have a chance of becoming Burned after receiving Toughness-Reducing DMG from an attack.

672280.Name: Common Mortal
672280.Effect: When an enemy target is defeated, every stack of <u>Suspicion</u> they had will regenerate <color=#f29e38ff>0.30</color> Energy for all allies.
672280.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy target is defeated, all allies regenerate Energy based on the <u>Suspicion</u> stacks on it.

672340.Name: Wingweaver
672340.Effect: When an enemy target is defeated, increase the Charging Efficiency of "<u>Dewdrop</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> up to a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> stack(s). Also restores HP for all allies equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of their respective Max HP.
672340.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy target is defeated, increases the Charging Efficiency of "<u>Dewdrop</u>." Also, restores HP for all allies.

672350.Name: Houyhnhnm
672350.Effect: Every stack of "<u>Grit</u>" a character has will increase their HP restored by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color>.
672350.AbridgedEffect: The higher the "<u>Grit</u>" stacks are, the more the character's HP restored is increased.

672360.Name: Peculiar Physician
672360.Effect: Increases maximum limit of "<u>Dewdrop</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, restores HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of Max HP to the character with the lowest current HP percentage.
672360.AbridgedEffect: Maximum limit of "<u>Dewdrop</u>" increases. After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, restores HP to the character with the lowest HP percentage.

672370.Name: Symbiote
672370.Effect: Increases character's HP restored by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color>. After providing healing to ally targets, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can trigger 1 time per character action.
672370.AbridgedEffect: Characters' HP restored increases. Has a chance of recovering Skill Points after providing healing to an allied target.

672371.Name: Tree of Discard
672371.Effect: Increases characters' Outgoing Healing by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>. After providing healing to an allied target, inflicts <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> <u>Spore(s)</u> to a random enemy target.
672371.AbridgedEffect: Increases characters' Outgoing Healing. After providing healing to an allied target, inflict <u>Spores</u> to a random enemy target.

672400.Name: Borderstar Gunslinger
672400.Effect: After a character is attacked and if they did not take DMG from this attack, they will only lose <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
672400.AbridgedEffect: When a character is attacked and does not take DMG, they will only lose a small amount of <u>Critical Boost</u>.

672410.Name: Amnesiac
672410.Effect: When a character deals DMG to a Frozen enemy target, each stack of <u>Critical Boost</u> additionally increases CRIT Rate by <color=#f29e38ff>4%</color> and CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
672410.AbridgedEffect: When a character deals DMG to a Frozen enemy target, each stack of <u>Critical Boost</u> additionally increases CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG.

672430.Name: Pacifist
672430.Effect: When a character's turn begins, every stack of <u>Critical Boost</u> they have will restore their HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of their Max HP, and restore HP to teammates equal to <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color> of their respective Max HP.
672430.AbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins, restore all allies' HP based on the number of <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks they have.

672470.Name: Departing Wanderer
672470.Effect: Increases characters' Basic ATK and Skill CRIT DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. The excess "<u>Critical Boost</u>" stacks will be regained at the start of the character's turn.
672470.AbridgedEffect: Characters' Basic ATK and Skill CRIT DMG increase. The excess "<u>Critical Boost</u>" stacks will be regained at the start of the character's turn.

672480.Name: Rehearser
672480.Effect: Increases CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color> for each stack of <u>Critical Boost</u>. When a character uses their Ultimate, inherits this max stack number and receives <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
672480.AbridgedEffect: Each stack of <u>Critical Boost</u> provides additional CRIT DMG. After a character uses their Ultimate, inherits and increases <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks.

672510.Name: Gravedigger
672510.Effect: After characters Break enemy targets, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>120%</color> base chance to afflict it with Freeze, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). If this enemy target is already Frozen, then additionally deal 1 instance of Break DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color> of the Break DMG that would have been dealt this time.
672510.AbridgedEffect: After characters Break enemy targets, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>120%</color> base chance to afflict it with Freeze, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). If this enemy target is already Frozen, then additionally deal 1 instance of Break DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color> of the Break DMG that would have been dealt this time.

672520.Name: Walker of the Scorched
672520.Effect: When a character has <u>Grit</u>, increases their All-Type RES PEN by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color>. Each stack of <u>Grit</u> a character has will increase their Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>.
672520.AbridgedEffect: When a character has <u>Grit</u>, increases their All-Type RES PEN. Each stack of <u>Grit</u> a character has will increase their Break Effect.

672530.Name: Pyromaniac
672530.Effect: Each stack of <u>Grit</u> increases the character's Max HP by <color=#f29e38ff>6%</color>, but Maximum Restorable HP will be reduced to <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of the additional Max HP.
672530.AbridgedEffect: Each stack of <u>Grit</u> increases the characters' Max HP, but reduces Maximum Restorable HP.

672540.Name: Sand Retrograder
672540.Effect: Increases characters' Weakness Break Efficiency by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>. After Weakness Breaking an enemy target, increases SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s).
672540.AbridgedEffect: Increases characters' Weakness Break Efficiency. After Weakness Breaking an enemy target, increases SPD.

672580.Name: Firesmith
672580.Effect: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>. Every 1% of HP a character loses will Charge <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>0.5%</color>.
672580.AbridgedEffect: Increases Ultimate DMG dealt by characters. Charges <u>Brain in a Vat</u> when characters lose HP.

672600.Name: Battlefield Magician
672600.Effect: After characters attack, receives a Shield equal to <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color> of the character's Max HP for every instance of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG dealt in this attack. The Shield cannot exceed <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color> of the character's Max HP and lasts for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
672600.AbridgedEffect: After characters use attacks, the more hits dealt from <u>Aftertaste</u>, the higher the Shield Effect gained.

672620.Name: Candy Knight
672620.Effect: The <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG dealt by characters can ignore Weakness Type and reduce <color=#f29e38ff>2.5</color> Toughness from enemy targets. In a single attack, this effect can be triggered against each enemy target up to <color=#f29e38ff>7</color> time(s).
672620.AbridgedEffect: Characters' <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG can reduce enemy target's Toughness regardless of the corresponding Type.

672630.Name: Drifting Circus
672630.Effect: Every time characters deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG, their Max HP increases by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color>, up to a max of <color=#f29e38ff>15</color> stack(s) and lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
672630.AbridgedEffect: The more hits of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG triggered by characters, the higher their Max HP become.

672670.Name: Balloon Merchant
672670.Effect: Increases the Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. After launching a Follow-up ATK, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
672670.AbridgedEffect: Increases the Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters. After launching a Follow-up ATK, recovers Skill Points.

672680.Name: Creation Vocalist
672680.Effect: After characters use their Ultimate, then after their next attack, deals <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> instance(s) of "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG to the attacked target, with each instance equal to <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> of the character's ATK.
672680.AbridgedEffect: After characters use their Ultimates, deal "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG after their next attack.

672700.Name: Phantom Larva
672700.Effect: Increases Basic ATK and Skill DMG dealt by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>. When "<u>Spores</u>" burst, the DMG dealt increases by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the total Collective Shield effect.
672700.AbridgedEffect: Basic ATK and Skill DMG dealt by characters increase. When "<u>Spore</u>" burst, the DMG dealt increases based on the total Collective Shield effect.

672710.Name: Phantom Worker
672710.Effect: The <u>Spore</u> DMG received by enemy targets increases by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color>. Reduces enemies' Effect RES by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> for each <u>Spore</u> stack they have.
672710.AbridgedEffect: The <u>Spore</u> DMG received by the enemy target increases. The more <u>Spore</u> stacks enemy targets have, the lower their Effect RES becomes.

672720.Name: Afterglow Worker
672720.Effect: Increases <u>Spore's</u> DMG multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of the original multiplier. When Spores burst, the DMG multiplier increases additionally by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color> of the original multiplier for each debuff the enemy target has.
672720.AbridgedEffect: Increases <u>Spore</u>'s DMG. When Spores burst, the DMG increases additionally for each debuff the enemy target has.

672721.Name: Pacifist Worker
672721.Effect: Every time characters consume Skill Points or have Skill Points overflow, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> base chance to inflict a random debuff on random enemy targets, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s). The random debuffs include: Decrease DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>15.0%</color>, decrease Effect RES by <color=#f29e38ff>20.0%</color>, or decrease Effect Hit Rate by <color=#f29e38ff>30.0%</color>.
672721.AbridgedEffect: Every time characters consume Skill Points or have Skill Points overflow, there is a chance to inflict a random debuff on random enemy targets. The random debuffs include: Decrease DMG dealt, decrease Effect RES, or decrease Effect Hit Rate.

672750.Name: Starcrusher Worker
672750.Effect: The characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color>. When a character uses a Basic ATK and their HP percentage is larger than or equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, consumes HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of their Max HP and additionally recovers 1 Skill Point.
672750.AbridgedEffect: The Basic ATK DMG dealt by the characters increases. When a character uses Basic ATK and their HP percentage is larger than or equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, they consume HP and additionally recover Skill Points.

672810.Name: Candelagraph Inspector
672810.Effect: When characters use their Ultimate, for each <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> Energy consumed, increases ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>4%</color> and Effect Hit Rate by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> times, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s). Each time an Ultimate is used, it will be considered as having consumed at least <color=#f29e38ff>80</color> Energy.
672810.AbridgedEffect: When characters use Ultimate, their ATK and Effect Hit Rate increase based on the amount of Energy consumed.

672840.Name: Penman
672840.Effect: After a character attacks and deals Ultimate DMG, for every enemy target hit, deals Ultimate DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the character's ATK to the enemy target with the highest Max HP.
672840.AbridgedEffect: For every enemy target that the character's Ultimate hits, deals Ultimate DMG to the enemy target with the highest Max HP.

672850.Name: Star-Picker
672850.Effect: When characters use Ultimate, gains <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> stack(s) of <u>Grit</u> and increases SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> and ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
672850.AbridgedEffect: Gains <u>Grit</u> when characters use their Ultimate, then boosts their SPD and ATK.

672860.Name: Repairman
672860.Effect: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>. After triggering a Follow-up ATK, every enemy target hit by the attack will make the next Ultimate ignore <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of the enemy targets' DEF, stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s).
672860.AbridgedEffect: Increases Ultimate DMG dealt by characters. After using a Follow-up ATK, every enemy target hit will additionally let the next Ultimate ignore target's DEF.

672870.Name: Kolchis
672870.Effect: For every 1 Skill Point consumed by a character, increases their Ultimate DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>65%</color>, up to a max increase of <color=#f29e38ff>130%</color> and lasting until after using their Ultimate.
672870.AbridgedEffect: The more Skill Points characters consume, the more Ultimate DMG they deal.

673140.Name: Oathkeeper
