673140.Effect: After turn <color=#f29e38ff>12</color> (counted as the cumulative number of turns taken by all allies) ends, action advances the first character in the current team and their memosprite by 100%. For the next <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s), grant them an extra turn at the end of the turn. After using an attack in this extra turn, deals Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>600%</color> of the attacker's ATK to the attacked target. Every stack of "<u>Obsession</u>" allies possess increases this DMG multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color> of the original multiplier.
673140.AbridgedEffect: For every <color=#f29e38ff>12</color> allied turns, advances the action of the first character in the current team and their memosprite, the character gains an extra turn, and attacking deals DMG based on the number of "<u>Obsession</u>" stacks.

673150.Name: Elegy Priest
673150.Effect: "Flower of Annihilation" appears in the Action Order: Records "<u>Blazar</u>" obtained by allies. When it takes action, deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>5000%</color> of the recorded value plus <color=#f29e38ff>3000%</color> <u>base DMG</u> to all enemy targets, then clears the record. Increases its SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color> for each "<u>Obsession</u>" stack that allies possess. When any ally target enters battle or is downed, or when any memosprite is summoned or disappears, Charges "<u>Blazar</u>" equal to <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> of Max HP for all ally targets.
673150.AbridgedEffect: Flower of Annihilation appears in the Action Order. During its action, deals DMG to all enemies based on "<u>Blazar</u>" and "<u>Obsession</u>." When any ally target enters battle/is summoned/is defeated, charges "<u>Blazar</u>" for the team.

673210.Name: Growth-Ring Carver
673210.Effect: When enemy targets become afflicted with Freeze or DoT status, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> base chance to Blast this effect to adjacent units. These effects are Blasted back to the original unit when no adjacent units are present. The same effect can only be Blasted 1 time per target per action. When one enemy target has Blasted effects a total of <color=#f29e38ff>12</color> times or when defeated, deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>2500%</color> <u>base DMG</u> to that target and adjacent targets. Every stack of "<u>Obsession</u>" allies possess increases this DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color>.
673210.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy is afflicted with Freeze or any DoT state, they have a chance to Blast the debuff to adjacent targets. When a debuff has been Blasted multiple times or when the target is defeated, deals DMG to the target and adjacent targets based on the number of "<u>Obsession</u>" stacks.

673250.Name: Nether Longship
673250.Effect: When enemy target receives "<u>Blazar</u>" DMG, "<u>Murmur</u>" stacks in possession obtains Charge equal to <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of this instance of DMG. This cannot exceed <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of the clearance threshold. For every <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of the clearance threshold "<u>Murmur</u>" Charges, the enemy target immediately takes 1 instance of Lightning DoT DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>400%</color> of the "<u>Murmur</u>" clearance threshold. Each enemy target can trigger this up to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s), and the trigger count resets after any unit's action. This DMG is "<u>Murmur</u>" DMG and cannot defeat the enemy target.
673250.AbridgedEffect: When "<u>Blazar</u>" deals DMG, it will Charge "<u>Murmur</u>." Every time "<u>Murmur</u>" Charges by a certain percentage, triggers 1 extra instance of DMG.

673280.Name: Whispering Woods
673280.Effect: After ally targets use Ultimates <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s) in total, "<u>Murmur</u>" deals DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of the original DMG multiplier to adjacent targets. DMG dealt by "<u>Murmur</u>" then additionally increases by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color> every time an Ultimate is used.
673280.AbridgedEffect: After ally targets use Ultimates <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s) in total, "<u>Murmur</u>" dealts DMG to adjacent targets. Then, DMG dealt by "<u>Murmur</u>" increases for every time an Ultimate is used.

673420.Name: Gray River's Representative
673420.Effect: After every <color=#f29e38ff>9</color> stack(s) of "<u>Critical Boost</u>" obtained by all allies or after defeating any enemy target, fires <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> Lux Arrow(s) to attack random enemy targets. Each Lux Arrow deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>350%</color> <u>base DMG</u>. Each Lux Arrow will cause "<u>Murmur</u>" to deal DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of the original DMG, and cause "<u>Murmur</u>" to gain Charge equal to <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of the total sum of ally characters' ATK.
673420.AbridgedEffect: After defeating any enemy target or gaining every <color=#f29e38ff>9</color> <u>Critical Boost</u>" stacks, fires a Lux Arrow to attack random enemy targets. The Lux Arrow charges "<u>Murmur</u>" and triggers "<u>Murmur</u>" DMG.

673470.Name: Beastkin
673470.Effect: When no enemy targets on field have "Beast Tongue," "Beast Tongue" is applied to random attacked target after ally targets use an attack. After enemies with "Beast Tongue" receive a total of <color=#f29e38ff>8</color> attack(s) or are defeated, they take Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>4000%</color> <u>base DMG</u>, adjacent targets take DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>3000%</color> <u>base DMG</u>, and all allies increase CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> and SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s). If in the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, then it is considered to additionally launching <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> attack(s).
673470.AbridgedEffect: After attacking, applies "Beast Tongue" on random attacked targets: When attacked <color=#f29e38ff>8</color> times or defeated, deals DMG to the target and adjacent enemies and increases all allies' CRIT DMG and SPD. While in the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, this is considered as additionally launching attacks.

673480.Name: Winged Tiger
673480.Effect: After ally targets use an attack, apply "Fearful Tremble" equal to their "<u>Critical Boost</u>" stack to an attacked target with the highest "Fearful Tremble" stacks. Every stack of "Fearful Tremble" reduces enemy targets' DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>0.5%</color>. When reaching <color=#f29e38ff>50</color> stack(s), it deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>3500%</color> of <u>base DMG</u> and loses <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> stack(s), then increases the enemy's CRIT DMG taken by <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s). When the enemy target takes action, they obtain all "Fearful Tremble" on the field. When they are defeated, "Fearful Tremble" will be applied to the enemy target with the highest current stacks.
673480.AbridgedEffect: After using an attack, applies stacks of "Fearful Tremble" equal to "<u>Critical Boost</u>" stacks on enemy targets. This reduces enemy targets' DMG dealt, deals DMG to the target upon reaching a certain number of stacks, and increases the target's CRIT DMG taken.

673510.Name: Berserker
673510.Effect: After any ally unit is attacked, it is considered as all ally targets have been attacked. All ally targets will Charge "<u>Blazar</u>" equal to <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color> of their respective Max HP.
673510.AbridgedEffect: After receiving an attack, it is considered as all ally targets having been attacked, and all ally targets will Charge their "<u>Blazar</u>."

673560.Name: Conflict Author
673560.Effect: When the total HP lost by ally targets is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of their Max HP or after recovering from being downed, deals "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>350%</color> of their Max HP to all enemies. When a character's turn starts, consumes HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of Max HP, increasing this value by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> after every time this effect is triggered. When ally characters become downed for the first time in this battle, restore their current HP to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of their Max HP, and HP will no longer be consumed when their turn starts.
673560.AbridgedEffect: When accumulating a certain amount of lost HP or recovering from being downed, deals "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG to all enemies based on their Max HP. Characters can resist fatal damage, and consume their HP at the start of every turn before this effect is triggered.

673580.Name: Sky Priest
673580.Effect: After ally targets are attacked, gain <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> "Lightning Sacrifice(s)." After they unleash a Counter, gain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> "Lightning Sacrifice(s)." When they have <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> "Lightning Sacrifice(s)," "Lightning Sacrifice" is cleared to increase Ultimate DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>180%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s) and deals <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color> "<u>Blazar</u>" DMG to all enemy targets. This damage is considered as Ultimate DMG.
673580.AbridgedEffect: After being attacked or having launched a Counter, gains "Lightning Sacrifice." When possessing <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> "Lightning Sacrifices," removes all "Lightning Sacrifice" and increases DMG dealt by Ultimate, as well as dealing Ultimate DMG to all enemies based on "<u>Blazar</u>."

673640.Name: Wounds of Plenty
673640.Effect: "Maddening Voice" appears in the Action Order: After any ally target launches a Follow-up ATK, advances their action by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color>. When taking action, advances the action of the first character in the current team by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. After that unit uses an attack, deals <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> instances(s) of "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of the ally target's ATK, and up to <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> instances of attacks can take effect. Moreover, all ally targets' "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG dealt multiplier increases by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the original multiplier, and a countdown with <color=#f29e38ff>150</color> SPD will appear in the Action Order. Effects will last until the countdown's turn begins.
673640.AbridgedEffect: "Maddening Voice" appears on the action bar: After any ally target launches a Follow-up ATK, advance the attacker's action. When the attacker takes action, action advances the first character in the current team, and deals multiple instances of "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG after they use an attack. Increases all allies' "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG.

673670.Name: Jolly Bandit
673670.Effect: For every 1 consumed or overflowing Skill point of ally targets, obtain 1 prize draw chance, up to <color=#f29e38ff>25</color> time(s). When entering the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, summons "Lottery Machine" and consumes all prize draw chances to obtain prizes, with a base draw of <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s). There is a small chance of obtaining the Special Prize, which deals 1 instance of DMG of a random Type equal to <color=#f29e38ff>4000%</color> of <u>base DMG</u> to all enemy targets and increases the "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG multiplier dealt by all allies by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> of the original multiplier. This effect can be stacked and lasts until the ally exits "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>". The Consolation Prize deals 1 instance of DMG of a random Type equal to <color=#f29e38ff>500%</color> of <u>base DMG</u> to random enemy targets.
673670.AbridgedEffect: After consuming or Overflowing Skill Points, you can obtain a prize draw chance. When entering the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, draw for a prize. There is a chance of dealing DMG or increasing "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG dealt while in the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state.

673690.Name: Tearless Garden
673690.Effect: After ally targets launch a Follow-up ATK, ignore Weakness Type to additionally reduce <color=#f29e38ff>10.0</color> Toughness. When ally targets Break enemy target Weakness, deals <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> instance(s) of "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> ATK to all enemy targets. Every point of Max Toughness the enemy target has increases this DMG multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color> of the original multiplier.
673690.AbridgedEffect: After an ally unit performs a Follow-up ATK, ignores Weakness Type to additionally reduce Toughness. When any ally target Breaks Weakness, deals "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG to all enemies based on their Max Toughness.

673710.Name: Home of Odes
673710.Effect: The Charge required for "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" increases by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. After entering the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, all ally targets' actions advance by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> and the DMG multiplier of the True DMG dealt by "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" increases by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of the original multiplier, additionally increasing by <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color> for every stack of "<u>Obsession</u>" possessed by all allies.
673710.AbridgedEffect: Increases the Charge required for the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state. After entering the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, advances all allies' actions and increases the multiplier of the True DMG dealt by "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>."

673790.Name: Cocoon Dressmaker
673790.Effect: When entering the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, inflict "Cocoon" to all enemy targets. They cannot take action in the next turn, are action delayed by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> at the start of the turn, and take Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>5000%</color> <u>base DMG</u>. While allies are in the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, enemy targets will become afflicted with "Cocoon" again every <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s), and "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" recovers <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> attack count(s) after the first time enemy targets become Weakness Broken.
673790.AbridgedEffect: While in the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, enemy targets will become unable to act and take DMG every several turns. Recovers the attack counts for "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" after Breaking an enemy's Weakness.

673860.Name: Theater Puppet Maker
673860.Effect: After the team uses a total of <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> Ultimate(s) while not under the Overclock effect, gains Overclock: After attacking with an Ultimate, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>130%</color> of the attacker's ATK <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s). After using an Ultimate, this status will end. The character in position 1 in the current team activates their Ultimate, Charges <u>Brain in a Vat</u> to <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color>, and uses Ultimate <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> times before the status ends on them.
673860.AbridgedEffect: Whenever allies have used Ultimates <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> time(s) in total, enters the "Overclock" state. While in this state and after an Ultimate is used to attack, deals "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG, and the first character in the current team activates their Ultimate and charges "<u>Brain in a Vat</u>" to <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color>.

673870.Name: Caprism
673870.Effect: After all allies use their Ultimates a total of <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s), deals <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> instances of Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>600%</color> <u>base DMG</u> to a random enemy target. This DMG will deal DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of the original DMG to adjacent units. Every time this effect is triggered, increases the number of instances by 1 in this battle and increases the Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate DMG dealt by ally targets by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>, to a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff>15</color> time(s).
673870.AbridgedEffect: Whenever allies have used Ultimates <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s) in total, deals DMG to a random enemy target and adjacent enemies. Every time this effect is triggered, increases its instance of DMG by 1 and increases the Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate DMG dealt by ally targets.

673920.Name: Lazy Fingerjoint
673920.Effect: When an ally target breaks an enemy target's Weakness, afflict them with <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> stack(s) of "<u>Harmonize</u>." After attacking Weakness Broken enemy targets, causes any DoT currently applied on it and "<u>Harmonize</u>" to immediately deal DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> of the original DMG.
673920.AbridgedEffect: When Breaking enemy Weakness, afflict it with "<u>Harmonize</u>." After attacking Weakness Broken enemy targets, causes any DoT currently applied on it and "<u>Harmonize</u>" to immediately deal 1 instance of DMG.

673950.Name: Flame-Chase Alliance
673950.Effect: When enemy targets take Break DMG, they additionally take <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> instance(s) of DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of "<u>Harmonize</u>" max limit, and charge all allies with "<u>Blazar</u>" equal to <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> of their respective Max HP. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn by enemy targets.
673950.AbridgedEffect: When any enemy target takes Break DMG, they additionally take "<u>Harmonize</u>" DMG and charge "<u>Blazar</u>" for all allies.

674140.Name: History Investigator
674140.Effect: After ally targets are attacked, increases all ally targets' SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s) and gains <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of "<u>Critical Boost</u>." "<u>Critical Boost</u>" will not be lost when memosprites are attacked.
674140.AbridgedEffect: After being attacked, increases all allies' SPD and grants them the "<u>Critical Boost</u>" effect. "<u>Critical Boost</u>" will not be lost when memosprites are attacked.

674160.Name: Brewer of Bitter Memories
674160.Effect: Every stack of "<u>Obsession</u>" additionally increases all ally targets' ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>1.5%</color>. After a character uses an attack, their memosprite's next attack is considered as a Follow-up ATK.
674160.AbridgedEffect: Each "<u>Obsession</u>" stack additionally increases all allies' ATK. After a character attacks, their memosprite's next attack is considered as a Follow-up ATK.

674170.Name: Memorial Chrysalis
674170.Effect: For each stack of "<u>Obsession</u>" ally target has, ally target's Basic ATK and Skill DMG dealt increase by <color=#f29e38ff>6%</color>. When an ally character departs from the field, is knocked down, or when an ally memosprite disappears, the character in position 1 in the current team obtains <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of that ally's "<u>Obsession</u>" stacks and an equal amount of "<u>Obsession</u>" max limit. This additional stack limit will disappear after <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
674170.AbridgedEffect: Every stack of "<u>Obsession</u>" increases Basic ATK and Skill DMG. Upon leaving the field, the first character in the current team obtains a certain percentage of "<u>Obsession</u>" stacks.

674190.Name: Hearth Clan
674190.Effect: Increases max "<u>Obsession</u>" stacks of allies by <color=#f29e38ff>4</color>, and increases Max HP by an additional <color=#f29e38ff>0.4%</color> for each "<u>Obsession</u>" stack for all allies. When breaking an enemy's Weakness, all allies gain <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> "<u>Obsession</u>" stacks.
674190.AbridgedEffect: Increases the maximum number of "<u>Obsession</u>" stacks. Each "<u>Obsession</u>" stack increases all allies' Max HP. All allies obtain "<u>Obsession</u>" when any enemy target is Broken.

674240.Name: Executor
674240.Effect: DoTs taken by enemy targets can CRIT. The CRIT Rate/CRIT DMG is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of all ally characters' total CRIT Rate/CRIT DMG, with CRIT DMG capped at <color=#f29e38ff>120%</color>.
674240.AbridgedEffect: DoTs taken by enemy targets can CRIT. The CRIT Rate/CRIT DMG is based on all ally characters' total CRIT Rate/CRIT DMG.

674260.Name: One Buried At Sea
674260.Effect: The clearing threshold of "<u>Murmur</u>" increases by <color=#f29e38ff>120%</color>. After ally targets launch a Follow-up ATK, causes the "<u>Murmur</u>" on the attacked target to deal DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of original DMG.
674260.AbridgedEffect: Increases the "<u>Murmur</u>" clearance threshold. Follow-up ATKs can trigger "<u>Murmur</u>" DMG.

674280.Name: Book-Burning Bureaucrat
674280.Effect: Increases Ultimate DMG dealt by ally targets by <color=#f29e38ff>160%</color>. After using Ultimate, causes the "<u>Murmur</u>" on the attacked target to gain Charge equal to <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of this instance of Ultimate DMG. This increase cannot exceed <color=#f29e38ff>300%</color> of the total sum of ally characters' ATK.
674280.AbridgedEffect: Increases Ultimate DMG and Ultimate DMG can charge "<u>Murmur</u>."

674410.Name: Archer of Recollections
674410.Effect: Increases the maximum stack of "<u>Critical Boost</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>4</color>. Every stack of "<u>Critical Boost</u>" additionally increases SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color> and additionally increases memosprite SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color>.
674410.AbridgedEffect: Increases the maximum number of "<u>Critical Boost</u>" stacks and additionally increases SPD. The SPD bonus effect is higher for memosprites.

674450.Name: Orphaned Daggers
674450.Effect: Increases "<u>Critical Boost</u>" max limit by <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> stack(s). For every <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> of total team Max HP lost by the entire team, the ally target acting next immediately receives 1 stack of "<u>Critical Boost</u>" at the start of the turn.
674450.AbridgedEffect: The maximum stack of "<u>Critical Boost</u>" increases. Every time the team loses a certain amount of HP, they gain "<u>Critical Boost</u>."

674460.Name: Roaming Troupe
674460.Effect: After any ally targets use an attack and deal CRIT DMG, deals 1 instance of True DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color>~<color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of the original DMG after attacking. If the attack was a Follow-up ATK, deals True DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color>~<color=#f29e38ff>70%</color> of the original DMG instead.
674460.AbridgedEffect: After dealing CRIT DMG via using an attack, additionally deals True DMG based on a random percent of the original DMG. Follow-up ATKs can increase this DMG.

674470.Name: Fowl-Hunting Golden Claw
674470.Effect: For every 1% of action advance effect gained by ally targets, increases DMG dealt in the next turn by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color>, up to a max of <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. This effect additionally increases by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> against targets in the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state.
674470.AbridgedEffect: After an ally target gains any action advance effects, they deal more DMG in their next turn. While in the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, further increases the DMG dealt.

674510.Name: Madness Malady
674510.Effect: When an ally target is hit with an attack or consumes HP while their HP percentage is less than <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>, consumes <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> stack(s) of "<u>Obsession</u>" from the target with the highest "<u>Obsession</u>" stacks in the team, heals for <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> of this unit's Max HP, and increases DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s). This effect can only be triggered <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) per turn.
674510.AbridgedEffect: While HP percentage is less than <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>, consumes "<u>Obsession</u>" from the ally target with the highest "<u>Obsession</u>" stacks in the team to restore HP and increase DMG dealt.

674520.Name: Ominous Flamespirit
674520.Effect: When ally targets deal "<u>Blazar</u>" DMG and if the enemy target is in any DoT state, the DMG multiplier of this instance of "<u>Blazar</u>" increases by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of the original multiplier. Every DoT type additionally increases this multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color>.
674520.AbridgedEffect: Increases "<u>Blazar</u>" DMG dealt to enemy targets in DoT states. The more DoT types the target has, the more this DMG is increased.

674570.Name: Coronal Phoenix
674570.Effect: Increases "<u>Blazar</u>" Charging Efficiency by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state is active, using Basic ATK/Skills to perform attacks deals <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> "<u>Blazar</u>" DMG to the target.
674570.AbridgedEffect: Increases the Charging Efficiency of "<u>Blazar</u>." After attacking via using Basic ATK/Skill while in the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, deals "<u>Blazar</u>" DMG to the target.

674590.Name: Kremnos Vanguards
674590.Effect: When ally targets Break any enemy target's Weakness, Charge "<u>Blazar</u>" equal to <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> of Max HP. If all enemy targets are Weakness Broken, "<u>Blazar</u>" will not be cleared at the start of ally targets' turns.
674590.AbridgedEffect: When Breaking Weakness, charges "<u>Blazar</u>." If all enemy targets are Weakness Broken, "<u>Blazar</u>" will not be cleared at the beginning of an ally target's turn.

674620.Name: Conspiracy Theorist
674620.Effect: After any ally target launches a Follow-up ATK, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> base chance to inflict 1 random debuff on the attacked target, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s). The random debuffs include: Decrease DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>15.0%</color>, decrease DEF by <color=#f29e38ff>30.0%</color>, and decrease SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>20.0%</color>.
674620.AbridgedEffect: After launching a Follow-up ATK, there's a high chance to inflict random debuffs on the attacked target.

674650.Name: Smiling Executioner
674650.Effect: After any ally target uses an attack, if their HP percentage is greater than <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>, consume <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> Max HP and deals 1 instance of "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>120%</color> of their Max HP.
674650.AbridgedEffect: After using an attack and if the attacker's HP percentage is greater than <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>, consumes this unit's HP to deal additional "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG.

674680.Name: Drunk Supervisor
674680.Effect: Increase CRIT DMG dealt by ally targets' Follow-up ATKs by <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color>. When using "<u>Brain in a Vat</u>" to launch Ultimate and deal DMG to enemy targets, it is considered as a Follow-up ATK.
674680.AbridgedEffect: Increases CRIT DMG dealt by ally targets' Follow-up ATKs. Ultimates cast with "<u>Brain in a Vat</u>" are considered as Follow-up ATKs.

674690.Name: Performance Artist
674690.Effect: For every time ally targets attack a Weakness Broken enemy target, this target takes 1 instance of "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>300%</color> of the attack's ATK when it recovers from being Weakness Broken.
674690.AbridgedEffect: Every time a Weakness Broken enemy target is attacked, this target additionally takes "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG when they recover from being Weakness Broken.

674710.Name: Memory Seed Cultivator
674710.Effect: The True DMG multiplier of "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" increases by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of the original multiplier and increases attack count by <color=#f29e38ff>4</color>. After a memosprite uses an attack, they can trigger the True DMG of "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" and consume its attack count.
674710.AbridgedEffect: Increases the True DMG dealt by "<u>Butterfly Soul.</u>" Memosprites' attacks will additionally apply True DMG from "<u>Butterfly Soul.</u>"

674740.Name: Wolfmother of the North
674740.Effect: Increases the CRIT DMG of ally targets' Basic ATK and Skill DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color>. While in the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, for every instance of attack used by an ally target, they immediately obtain <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color> of Charge for "<u>Soul Chrysalis</u>" when they exit the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state. Charge gained this way cannot exceed <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>.
674740.AbridgedEffect: Increases CRIT DMG dealt by Basic ATK/Skill. When attacking while in the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, you can Charge "<u>Soul Chrysalis</u>" upon leaving the state.

674780.Name: Book-Weaving Divine Machine
674780.Effect: When ally target enters "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, used Ultimate also deals "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>"'s True DMG, and increases "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>"'s attack count by <color=#f29e38ff>2</color>. This effect triggers up to 1 time for each ally.
674780.AbridgedEffect: After ally targets enter "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, using Ultimate also deals "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" True DMG and increases "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" attack count.

674790.Name: Orphan Carehouse
674790.Effect: After breaking an enemy target's Weakness, recovers <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> Skill Points. Using Basic ATK and Skills to attack enemy targets inflicts <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> additional Toughness Reduction and applies <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> "<u>Harmonize</u>" stacks.
674790.AbridgedEffect: When Breaking enemy targets' Weakness, recovers Skill Points. Using Basic ATKs and Skill to attack enemy targets can cause additional Toughness Reduction and apply "<u>Harmonize</u>."

674810.Name: Erythrokeramism
674810.Effect: After a memosprite uses an attack, Charge their memomaster's "<u>Brain in a Vat</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color>. After the memomaster uses "<u>Brain in a Vat</u>" to use their Ultimate, increases the memosprite's DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>240%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> turn(s).
674810.AbridgedEffect: After a memosprite attacks, Charges their memomaster's "<u>Brain in a Vat.</u>" After a memomaster uses their Ultimate via "<u>Brain in a Vat,</u>" increases their memosprite's DMG.

674820.Name: Giant Wise Tree
674820.Effect: Ally targets' ATK increases by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. After using ATKs that deal Ultimate DMG, causes the "<u>Murmur</u>" on the attacked target to deal DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color> of original DMG.
674820.AbridgedEffect: Increases ATK. After using attacks to deal Ultimate DMG, triggers "<u>Murmur</u>" DMG.

674840.Name: Warring Scholar
674840.Effect: When any ally target Breaks any enemy target's Weakness, Charges "<u>Brain in a Vat</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> and regenerates Energy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of Max Energy. After defeating any enemy target, regenerates Energy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of Max Energy.
674840.AbridgedEffect: When Breaking enemy targets' Weakness, Charges "<u>Brain in a Vat</u>" and regenerates Energy. After any enemy target is defeated, regenerates Energy.

674850.Name: Forbidden Knowledge's Martyr
674850.Effect: When any ally target uses their Ultimate, consumes HP from all ally targets equal to <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of their current HP and increases their DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> to a max of <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> stack(s), lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
674850.AbridgedEffect: When using Ultimate, all allies consume HP and increases their DMG dealt.

674920.Name: Wilting Patient
674920.Effect: When enemy targets take "<u>Harmonize</u>" DMG, additionally take 1 instance of "<u>Harmonize</u>" DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color> of the original DMG. Every debuff currently on the target additionally increases this DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color>, up to a max of <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>.
674920.AbridgedEffect: "<u>Harmonize</u>" DMG is triggered 1 more time. This DMG increases with the number of debuffs afflicted on the enemy target.

674950.Name: Sym-Thanatos
674950.Effect: Increases ally target's Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. When using attacks to Break enemy targets' Weaknesses, gain a shield that can offset DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of their Max HP that lasts <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> turn(s). Also additionally deals <color=#f29e38ff>300%</color> of "<u>Blazar</u>" DMG to the current target after an attack.
674950.AbridgedEffect: Increases Break Effect. After Breaking enemy targets' Weakness, gains a Shield and deals "<u>Blazar</u>" DMG to the target.

674970.Name: Society of Charity
674970.Effect: After any ally target attacks a Weakness Broken enemy target, converts the Toughness Reduction of this attack into 1 instance of <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> <u>Super Break DMG</u>. While in the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, this effect additionally deals <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> <u>Super Break DMG</u>.
674970.AbridgedEffect: After ally targets attack Weakness Broken enemy targets, deal <u>Super Break DMG</u>. While in the "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" state, this DMG is increased.

675140.Name: Judge of the Nightveil
675140.Effect: When a memosprite disappears, increases all ally targets' SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> and CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> turn(s).
675140.AbridgedEffect: When any memosprite disappears, increases all ally targets' SPD and CRIT DMG.

675160.Name: Joyspring Fount
675160.Effect: Every stack of "<u>Obsession</u>" on the ally team increases Follow-up ATK DMG and Additional DMG received by enemy targets by <color=#f29e38ff>0.3%</color>. After enemy targets receive DMG from summons, this effect further increases by <color=#f29e38ff>0.2%</color>, lasting for 1 turn.
675160.AbridgedEffect: The more stacks of "<u>Obsession</u>," the more Follow-up ATK and Additional DMG enemy targets take. This effect further increases after enemy targets are attacked by summons.

675170.Name: Life-Giving Sculptor
675170.Effect: Increases DMG dealt by memosprites by <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color>. After a memosprite uses an attack, the DMG dealt by the memomaster's next Basic ATK/Skill increases by <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color>.
675170.AbridgedEffect: Increases DMG dealt by memosprites. After a memosprite uses an attack, increases the DMG dealt by their memomaster's next Basic ATK or Skill.

675180.Name: Bard
675180.Effect: While allies' "<u>Obsession</u>" stacks exceed <color=#f29e38ff>70</color>, increases Ultimate DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color> and memosprite DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color>.
675180.AbridgedEffect: While all allies have more than <color=#f29e38ff>70</color> "<u>Obsession</u>" stacks, increases DMG dealt by Ultimate and DMG dealt by memosprites.

675190.Name: Priest of Time
675190.Effect: While ally targets possess "<u>Obsession</u>" increases All-Type RES PEN by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color>. Every "<u>Obsession</u>" stack increases all ally targets' Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff>0.5%</color>.
675190.AbridgedEffect: While ally targets have "<u>Obsession</u>," increase their All-Type RES PEN. Every "<u>Obsession</u>" stack increases all allies' Break Effect.

675210.Name: Passenger of River of Souls
675210.Effect: Increases DoT dealt by ally targets by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When enemy targets enter battle, they become afflicted with "Observed." At the start of the turn, they take Fire DoT equal to <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color> <u>base DMG</u>. This DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color> for every stack of "<u>Obsession</u>" possessed by all ally targets.
675210.AbridgedEffect: Increases DoT dealt by ally targets. Enemy targets take Fire DoT based on the total number of all ally targets' "<u>Obsession</u>" stacks at the beginning of the turn.

675240.Name: Black Tide's Decrepit Bow
675240.Effect: Ally targets' ATK increases by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>. After all allies end a total of <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> turns, causes the DMG dealt by "<u>Murmur</u>" to increase by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>.
675240.AbridgedEffect: Increases ATK. After a certain number of allies' turns have passed, increases damage dealt by "<u>Murmur</u>."

675250.Name: Grim Pilgrim
675250.Effect: When enemy targets enter battle, they are inflicted with the Bleed effect. While Bleeding, they will take Physical DoT equal to <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of their Max HP at the start of their turn. This DMG cannot exceed <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color> of all ally targets' total HP.
675250.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy target enters battle, inflicts Bleed on them, making them take Physical DoT at the beginning of the turn.

675270.Name: Bone Planter
675270.Effect: The clearing threshold of "<u>Murmur</u>" increases by <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color>. After consuming Skill Point(s), Charge "<u>Murmur</u>" for all enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>4%</color> of the clearing threshold.
675270.AbridgedEffect: Increases the clearing threshold for "<u>Murmur</u>." After consuming Skill Point(s), charges "<u>Murmur</u>" for all enemies.

675280.Name: Society of Disappointment
675280.Effect: When any enemy targets are defeated, regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>5.0</color> Energy for all allies for every Burn, Shock, Bleed, or Wind Shear states they possess.
675280.AbridgedEffect: When any enemy target is defeated, regenerates Energy for all ally targets based on the number of DoT states the target had.

675420.Name: Law's Arbitrators
675420.Effect: For every "<u>Murmur</u>" Charge that equals to 1% of the clearing threshold, increases CRIT DMG taken by enemy targets by <color=#f29e38ff>1.0%</color>, up to a max of <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color>.
675420.AbridgedEffect: Increases CRIT DMG taken by enemy targets for every 1% of the clearing threshold that the current charge of "<u>Murmur</u>" has reached.

675450.Name: Kremnos Traveler
675450.Effect: Increases Shield Effect gained by ally targets by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>. After ally targets are attacked and if they did not take DMG in this attack, they will only lose <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of "<u>Critical Boost</u>."
675450.AbridgedEffect: Increases Shield Effect gained by ally targets. After ally targets are attacked and if they did not take DMG in this attack, they will only lose a small amount of "<u>Critical Boost</u>."

675480.Name: Hunter of Monstrous Beasts
675480.Effect: Increase CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color> for each stack of "<u>Critical Boost</u>." When an ally target uses their Ultimate, inherit this max stack number and receive <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of "<u>Critical Boost</u>."
675480.AbridgedEffect: Each stack of "<u>Critical Boost</u>" additionally increases CRIT DMG. When ally targets use Ultimate, they inherit and gain "<u>Critical Boost</u>."

675490.Name: Cleaner
675490.Effect: When any ally target deals DMG to a Weakness Broken enemy target, each stack of "<u>Critical Boost</u>" additionally increases CRIT Rate by <color=#f29e38ff>4%</color> and CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
675490.AbridgedEffect: When dealing DMG to a Weakness Broken enemy target, each stack of "<u>Critical Boost</u>" additionally increases CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG.

675510.Name: War Scribes
675510.Effect: Ally targets' Max HP increases by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>. When entering battle or summoning memosprite, charges "<u>Blazar</u>" equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of each unit's Max HP. Then, when the next turn begins, "<u>Blazar</u>" is not depleted.
675510.AbridgedEffect: Increases Max HP. When entering battle or summoning memosprite, charges "<u>Blazar</u>." Then, when the first turn begins, "<u>Blazar</u>" is not depleted.

675520.Name: Fang of Dying Sun
675520.Effect: Increases all ally targets' Effect RES by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> and "<u>Blazar</u>" DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>. When resisting debuffs, deals Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of "<u>Blazar</u>" to the target. This DMG cannot defeat enemy targets.
675520.AbridgedEffect: Increases Effect RES and "<u>Blazar</u>" DMG dealt. When resisting debuffs, deals "<u>Blazar</u>" DMG to the target.

675540.Name: Foolish Child of Golden Blood
675540.Effect: When an enemy target is defeated, increase the Charging Efficiency of "<u>Blazar</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>18%</color> up to a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> stack(s). Also, restores HP for all allies equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of their respective Max HP.
675540.AbridgedEffect: When any enemy target is defeated, increases Charging Efficiency for "<u>Blazar</u>" and restores HP for all allies.

675560.Name: Red Moon's Messenger
675560.Effect: Increases "<u>Blazar</u>" Base Value by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. After any ally target launches a Follow-up ATK, the ally target with the lowest current HP percentage restores HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of their Max HP.
675560.AbridgedEffect: Increases "<u>Blazar</u>" Base Value. After any ally target launches a Follow-up ATK, restore HP to the ally target with the lowest current HP percentage.

675590.Name: Skyblade's Legion
675590.Effect: Increases Shield Effect gained by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>. After Breaking an enemy target's Weakness, all allies obtain a Shield equal to <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> of their Max HP for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
675590.AbridgedEffect: Increases Shield Effect gained. After Breaking the enemy target's Weakness, all allies obtain a Shield.

675620.Name: Send-Off Carnival
675620.Effect: For every type of debuff an enemy target is afflicted with, the Follow-up ATK DMG they receive increases by <color=#f29e38ff>6%</color>, up to a max of <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>.
675620.AbridgedEffect: Enemy targets with more debuffs take more Follow-up ATK DMG.

675650.Name: Water Lyrist
675650.Effect: After any ally target launches a Follow-up ATK, deals <color=#f29e38ff>70%</color> of "<u>Blazar</u>" DMG to the attacked targets.
675650.AbridgedEffect: After launching a Follow-up ATK, deals additional "<u>Blazar</u>" DMG.

675670.Name: Wave-Chasing Siren
675670.Effect: Increases the Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by ally targets by <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color>. After launching a Follow-up ATK, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
675670.AbridgedEffect: Increases DMG dealt by Follow-up ATKs. Recovers Skill Points after launching a Follow-up ATK.

675680.Name: Sophist of Gods
675680.Effect: After an ally uses an Ultimate, when using the next attack, deals "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>240%</color> ATK <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) to the target.
675680.AbridgedEffect: After using Ultimate, deals "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG after the next attack.

675690.Name: Boat of Intoxication
675690.Effect: "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG dealt by ally targets can ignore Weakness Type and reduce <color=#f29e38ff>1.0</color> Toughness from enemy targets. In a single attack, this effect can be triggered against each enemy target up to <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> time(s). This effect is not active in the enemy target's turn.
675690.AbridgedEffect: "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG dealt can reduce enemy target's Toughness regardless of Weakness Type.

675710.Name: Creation Nymph
675710.Effect: After a memosprite attacks, "<u>Soul Chrysalis</u>" Charges for <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> with a <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> chance to recover <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> Skill Point(s).
675710.AbridgedEffect: Memosprites using attacks can Charge "<u>Soul Chrysalis</u>" with a chance to recover Skill Points.

675720.Name: Boulder Court
675720.Effect: Increases the True DMG multiplier of "<u>Butterfly Soul</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> of the original multiplier. Every debuff on the enemy target additionally increases this by <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color> of the original multiplier.
675720.AbridgedEffect: Increases the True DMG of "<u>Butterfly Soul.</u>" Every debuff on the enemy target additionally increases the multiplier.

675750.Name: Golden Mysteries
675750.Effect: Increases Basic ATK/Skill DMG dealt by ally targets' by <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color>. When an ally uses a Basic ATK and their HP percentage is higher than or equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, consumes HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of their Max HP and additionally recovers 1 Skill Point.
675750.AbridgedEffect: Increases Basic ATK / Skill DMG dealt. When using Basic ATK and if the attacker's HP percentage is <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> or higher, consumes HP and additionally recovers Skill Points.

675760.Name: Thief Musician
675760.Effect: For every Skill Point used by an ally target, the next attack applies "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>70%</color> ATK to the target, stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s).
675760.AbridgedEffect: For every 1 Skill Point consumed by ally targets, the next attack additionally applies "<u>Aftertaste</u>" DMG.

675790.Name: Radiant Jellyfish
675790.Effect: Ally targets' Basic ATK DMG and Skill DMG ignore <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> of the enemy target's DEF. This effect increases to <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> on enemy targets in the Weakness Broken state.
675790.AbridgedEffect: Basic ATK DMG and Skill DMG dealt ignore a certain percentage of the enemy target's DEF. This effect additionally increases on Weakness Broken enemy targets.

675810.Name: Sand Scribe
675810.Effect: When characters use Ultimate, gains <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of "<u>Obsession</u>" for themselves and their memosprite, increases SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color>, and increases ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>70%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s).
675810.AbridgedEffect: When a character uses Ultimate, they and their memosprite gain "<u>Obsession</u>" and increase SPD and ATK.

675840.Name: Child of Spiral
675840.Effect: When an ally target's "<u>Brain in a Vat</u>" reaches 100%, increases their ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color>. After using an attack, deals Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of ATK to the enemy target with the highest HP among the targets attacked, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s).
675840.AbridgedEffect: When "<u>Brain in a Vat</u>" reaches 100%, increases ATK. After using an ATK, deals Additional DMG to the attacked target with the highest HP.

675860.Name: Lotophagism
675860.Effect: When ally targets use their Ultimate, for each <color=#f29e38ff>50</color> Energy consumed, increases ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> and increases the DMG multiplier of "<u>Aftertaste</u>" dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color> of the original multiplier. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> times, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s). Each time an Ultimate is used, it will be considered as having consumed at least <color=#f29e38ff>80</color> Energy.
675860.AbridgedEffect: When using Ultimate, increases ATK based on the Energy consumed and increases the "<u>Aftertaste</u>" multiplier dealt.

675870.Name: White Dryad
675870.Effect: For every 1 Skill Point consumed by an ally target, increases their Ultimate DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>65%</color>, up to a max increase of <color=#f29e38ff>130%</color> and lasting until after using their Ultimate.
675870.AbridgedEffect: The more Skill Points ally targets consume, the more Ultimate DMG is dealt.

675890.Name: Nodist School
675890.Effect: When ally characters use Ultimate to attack, CRIT DMG dealt increases by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>, and the attack ignores Weakness Types to additionally reduce <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> Toughness.
675890.AbridgedEffect: Increases CRIT DMG when using Ultimate to attack, and additionally reduces Toughness regardless of Weakness Type.

675910.Name: Court of Echoes
675910.Effect: Every stack of "<u>Obsession</u>" increases Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff>0.8%</color>. Memosprite's Break Effect additionally increases by <color=#f29e38ff>0.5%</color>.
675910.AbridgedEffect: "<u>Obsession</u>" increases Break Effect and additionally increases memosprites' Break Effect.

675920.Name: Disoriented Hermit
675920.Effect: When any ally target used an attack to inflict a debuff on enemy targets, apply <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of "<u>Harmonize</u>" to the enemy targets. If the targets are Weakness Broken, the applied stacks are doubled.
675920.AbridgedEffect: When an attack inflicts a debuff on an enemy, additionally applies "<u>Harmonize</u>." If the enemy is Weakness Broken, applies doubled "<u>Harmonize</u>" stacks.

675940.Name: Flame-Chase Envoy
675940.Effect: Increases ally targets' Weakness Break Efficiency by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>. After Weakness Breaking an enemy target, increases SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> and ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
675940.AbridgedEffect: Increases Weakness Break Efficiency. Increases SPD and ATK after Breaking enemy target's Weakness.

675960.Name: Dawn Troupe
675960.Effect: Increases the DMG multiplier of "<u>Harmonize</u>" by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. After ally targets launch a Follow-up ATK, apply <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of "<u>Harmonize</u>" to attacked targets.
675960.AbridgedEffect: Increases "<u>Harmonize</u>" DMG. After ally targets launch a Follow-up ATK, additionally applies "<u>Harmonize</u>."
